description: Sin descripción

name: Atelier Mysterious Trilogy DX: Special Collection Box
description: Sin descripción

name: Hoplegs
description: Hoplegs is a different kind of platformer with unconventional controls. Each of the four buttons on your gamepad where you usually jump, interact, crouch and change weapons are now your different legs.

name: Raiden IV x Mikado Remix
description: Raiden IV, the popular shoot 'em up arcade and console game, debuts on Nintendo Switch. Instill fear in your enemies with devastating attacks and earn the acclaimed title of Master Ace!

name: Dread Hunger
description: A game of horror, survival, and betrayal. Explorers path their ship through the unforgiving Arctic. Among the crew, two traitors call on dark powers to undermine them.

name: NieR Replicant Ver. 1.22474487139...: White Snow Edition
description:
The upgraded prequel of NieR:Automata. A kind young man sets out with a strange talking grimoire, to search for the "Sealed verses" in order to save his sister Yonah, who fell terminally ill to the Black Scrawl.

NieR Replicant ver.1.22474487139... is an updated version of NieR Replicant, previously only released in Japan.

Discover the one-of-a-kind prequel of the critically-acclaimed masterpiece NieR:Automata. Now with a modern upgrade, experience masterfully revived visuals, a fascinating storyline and more!

WHITE SNOW EDITION includes:

- NieR Replicant ver.1.22474487139... STANDARD EDITION physical game (packed separately)

- Grimoire Pin Set:
Grimoire Weiss, Grimoire Noir, Grimoire Rubrum are recreated as a set of pins, each one at a whopping 9 mm (approx. 3/8") in thickness. These can stand upright on their own, so you can display them as you please.

- Script Set: A set of seven books encompassing the spoken script of the game. Packaged in a special hard case, featuring covers art by character designer, Akihiko Yoshida.

- Original Soundtrack: A two-disc collection featuring newly-recorded and arranged music for NieR Replicant ver.1.22474487139..., presented in a premium Grimoire Weiss-inspired package.

- Steelbook Case: A metal case featuring stunning artwork by illustrator Kazuma Koda.

- Lunar Tear Collector’s Box.

name: Wonder Boy: Asha in Monster World
description: Asha, the warrior protagonist of the game, is involved in a serious incident that will affect the survival of her world. Our green-haired heroine doesn’t have to save the world all alone, and sets off on an adventure with her cute flying friend, the blue Pepelogoo. Asha and the Pepelogoo have to work together to become the heroes the world needs them to be. The road ahead is long - will they be able to save their world?

name: Dungeon and Gravestone
description: Death and resurrection, death and resurrection. There is a world full of grief and sadness, were only end of life is certain. In this world, there is a city where people take annihilation for granted, and this city is grim like an empty shell. Who am I? Just stepping into the dungeon in front of me… Rogue-like RPG where one dies over and over again. Generated dungeons are full of difficult traps and puzzles. Putting one’s life on the line, player is challenged with over 500 quests, weapon and item collection, fishing. How deep can you dive? Defy the unprecedented dungeon automatic generation algorithm! Finally find out what lies beyond the deep dungeon…

name: Wraith: The Oblivion - Afterlife
description: You died in a mysterious seance and have become a Wraith, one of the restless undead. In this VR horror game, use your supernatural abilities to solve the mystery behind your death. But beware of the sinister Spectres lurking in the shadows...

name: Bamerang
description: Bämeräng is a fast paced boomerang fighting game for two to four players. Fight for the favor of the goddess in an outlandish, colorful world in this local multiplayer game.

name: NieR Replicant ver.1.22474487139...
description: NieR Replicant ver.1.22474487139... is an updated version of NieR Replicant, previously only released in Japan. Discover the one-of-a-kind prequel to the critically-acclaimed masterpiece NieR: Automata. Now with a modern upgrade, experience masterfully revived visuals, a fascinating storyline and more!

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit II

name: Turnip Boy Commits Tax Evasion
description: Avoid paying taxes, solve plantastic puzzles, harvest crops and battle massive beasts all in a journey to tear down a corrupt vegetable government!

name: Orbital Bullet
description: Orbital Bullet is a fast paced 360° action-platformer with rogue-lite elements. Travel to numerous planets, where monsters and dangers await you. Use found ressources to craft new weaponry & upgrades to get stronger. Only a true master of 360° combat will be able to save his home.

name: Astro: The Beginning
description: Astro: The Beginning is a dynamic side scrolling shoot 'em up about a close-knit space team caught in a clusterf*ck of epic proportions.Unravel the evil plans of your foes and secrets of world order while taking down various types of enemies and engaging in crazy boss battles.

name: We Are the Caretakers
description: We Are The Caretakers is an afrofuturist sci-fi squad management RPG. Recruit, train, and manage an arcane team of protectors to unite cultures and defend the endangered wildlife you rely on, after the massive energy barrier that separates you from a wider universe mysteriously falls.

name: Buildings Have Feelings Too!
description: Old Pete, “The Dock Yard”, is being demolished. He’s the first of his group of friends to go. It was unexpected and everyone is a bit worried. Being made of bricks and mortar doesn’t mean you don’t have your own things to worry about. This ragtag group of friends were there, right from the start, when it really became a city. With them they brought the titans of the industry, hundreds of jobs, and hundreds more houses. But the Linen Mill’s not been getting many textile orders come through this year, the Warehouse lost another contract from the neighbouring city and the Old Bank’s having money troubles. Something’s not quite right. Change is coming. What if they’re next? Fortunately, you, The Halfway Hotel, are at hand to step in and reassure everyone that things will be ok. But what starts off as small odd jobs ends up unravelling into more problems, as history moves faster than you can keep up with. Fortunately, you, The Halfway Hotel, are at hand to step in and reassure everyone that things will be ok. But what starts off as small odd jobs ends up unravelling into more problems, as history moves faster than you can keep up with. Buildings Have Feelings Too! is an exciting new city management game about buildings and the city they inhabit. Imagine a city where buildings can walk and talk to one another. Each one has its own aspirations, hopes and fears. Most of the time they are just trying to get along with each…

name: Apollo Justice: Ace Attorney 4
description: Set in the year 2029, it continues to follow the career of Apollo Justice, who is forced to find a new underage magician assistant after every other character from AJ1 leaves for Hawaii. He soon becomes acquainted with a brand new cast of characters, and, of course, becomes involved in a number of unusual murders and cases.

name: Lug's Tiny Torture Lite
description: Sin descripción

name: MP1: Dive to the Hearts
description: Sin descripción

name: Monstro Giganto
description: Welcome to the world of Monstro Giganto! Take control of one of the four monstros and duke it out against the other player or vs AI in four different arenas. Crafted with all PETSCII graphics with smart and progressively tougher AI, explosive music and sfx besides a generous amount of speech, Monstro Giganto is wrapped up in a challenging gameplay no Commodore monstro can resist!

name: Vai Juliette!
description: Vai Juliette! is an endless runner in which your mission is to help increase Juliette's fandom. Run non-stop faster and faster, dodging enemies and jumping over walls while collecting Cactus and Couscous along the way!

name: The Weight of a Soul
description:
In a world of arcane mysteries, a young doctor's apprentice unravels a conspiracy most grim.

The Weight of a Soul is a mystery-horror interactive novel inspired by IF classics like Blue Lacuna and Anchorhead.

name: Water Star Adventure
description:
Water Star Adventure is a ROM hack for Super Mario 64. It is the seventh installment of the "Star Adventure" hack series, featuring 7 courses with 30 stars including a Bowser fight.

The gimmick, as the game title implies, it has a new mechanism using water physics that the player can use to swim to navigate unreachable places. The plot is bound with philosophy and religious metaphors and most stars and NPCs will tell the player have more or less relevance in the gameplay.

name: Infinite Links
description:
Talismans are magical items that contain great power, even with some that can grant any desire. Kronos, a boy training as a wizard, and Serene, who consider one another as siblings, become enveloped in a Talisman conspiracy. Will they be able to save themselves and the world from the threatening danger?

Equip Talismans to the Skill Board to acquire skills and fatal moves to turn the tides in turn-based battles. Forging and upgrading weapons, armor and Talismans from materials will grant you additional advantages. There are also strategic elements with battle formations and traps, and not to mention the variety of quests, arena and monster achievements that await as challenges!

name: Subugs
description: Sin descripción

name: Fallen of the Round
description: Fallen of the round is a dungeon roguelike based on miniatures. Fight against the monsters you encounter in beautifully recreated and massive dungeons. In battles, you place your pawns and aim them at the enemy to attack. Placement based on the characteristics of each class will determine your victory. After victory, you will be able to acquire new pawns and upgrade them to challenge deeper into the game. A variety of classes and skills will be available. Collecting 3 of the same pawns will increase the rank of the pawn and equip it with new skills.

name: Among Ass 2: Butt Warfare
description: Asses are back in an adrenaline-pumping sequel! Now you can fight back bad asses with big boom-sticks! Gather friends and choose a side of the conflict.

name: Yupitergrad: Sneaki Peaki
description: Sneaki Peaki is a special, free edition of Yupitergrad - a Virtual Reality game with spatial acrobatics, wacky humor and lots of sovietpunk adventures!

name: Brutal 2urvive Bundle
description:
This Bundle contains Brutal Rage and 2urvive.
Two perfect games for all lovers of brutal indie games.
All of these games are playable in local co-op !

name: The Far Kingdoms: Hidden Magic
description: A new hidden object adventure in the Far Kingdoms awaits you! Solve the puzzles and search for hidden clues to find who is responsible for King's untimely death.

name: LaserShotz
description: LaserShotz is an online PvP competitive arena shooter! Compete for the best rating on the leaderboards!

name: Rescue Operation
description: Is a first-person shooter game. The game will follow the scenario of the game, and destroy the enemies in its path

name: The Gorcs' Forge
description: Amid the news of the returning Tronraneren dwarves and the imminence of a new war, take the role of Zrurk, leader of the Gorcs - experts in the art of forging - and manage the workforce, inputs, capital, other resources and help provide all the equipment and weaponry needed to defeat the dwarf army!

name: Zaccaria Pinball: Farfalla Deluxe Pinball Table
description: Farfalla Deluxe is the next Zaccaria table with a fully animated color display. It also features more modern pinball elements.

name: Crazy Indian
description: Welcome to Crazy Indian! Discover an interesting world filled with traps!

name: PandaSG
description: A little cute panda, holding a gun to defend its little hometown...

name: The Shattering: Secret Room
description: The Shattering is presenting a mysterious Secret Room, a place filled with wonders and surprises. Discover a new environment, deleted content from the main game, developer commentary and many more.

name: Gitadora High-Voltage
description: The eighth game in the Gitadora series, a spinoff series of the GituarFreaks and DrumMania franchises.

name: Eight Thirty, Nowhere
description: Eight Thirty, Nowhere is an attempt at creating a massive, open space that is sparse, largely empty, with a focus on being a tone piece above all else.

name: Power Washer Hero
description: Use your power washer to move objects, put out fires, and clean grime away.

name: Unity of Command II: Barbarossa
description: In this DLC, you command Axis forces during Operation Barbarossa, from their summer of roaring victories to the painful halt at the gates of Moscow in the winter of 1941/42.

name: Infinity ZigZag
description: Infinity ZigZag is an arcade game where you need to change the direction of a circle moving along a zigzag corridor.

name: Neo 2045
description: Gear up for adventure in this free-to-play MMO set in a futuristic solar system! Neo 2045 is a massive digital playground that lets you explore new realms, create your own world, and play YOU. See some action as you compete in thrilling mini games and defend the NEOVERSE against your robot enemies!

name: The ER: Patient Typhon
description: The ER: Patient Typhon is an atmosphere and exploration horror game with a light level of deadly action and disturbing, environmental puzzles.

name: Bitten!
description:
Bitten! is a multiplayer game (4-10 people) where you and your mates defend the Shelter from zombies in a post-apocalypse world.

But be careful, some of you may turn out to be traitors! They've been bitten by a zombie and trying to kill everybody else.

Use power-ups, logic, tricks, and voice chat to disclose traitors betray and kill other players while avoiding being noticed! Innocent players fight with zombies to pick up weapons and power-ups (like scanners to expose traitors). Players use voice or text chat to convince others they are innocent!

name: The Door in the Basement
description: The Door in the Basement is an atmospheric pixelated horror game set in a mysterious subterranean world.

name: Tender: Creature Comforts
description: Tender is a narrative game that explores connection and rejection in the era of swipe culture. It's a story told by and through the modern interface for finding love.

name: Friends Killing Friends
description: Friends Killing Friends is a PVP deathmatch where you kill your friend with a gun and a bunch of cards.

name: World-Splitter
description:
World-Splitter” is a 2D² puzzle platformer, challenging you with multidimensional puzzles.

You'll travel through wonderful and fantastic worlds that are beautifully animated and full of tricky challenges.

The game features a unique gameplay mechanic: A combination of jump & run elements and logical thinking puzzles. Each level consist of two parallel worlds separated by the ’Dimension Rift‘. The character can move freely through the Rift and interacts only with the visible parts of both worlds.

You have to master the Rift and make it pave your way through the worlds!

name: MotoGP 21
description: Take your place on the starting grid and get ready for the most realistic and immersive MotoGP™ videogame ever. Live the most authentic 2-wheels racing experience with the new MotoGP™21!

name: Atelier Mysterious Trilogy DX
description: The definitive edition of the Mysterious trilogy titles, featuring new content and a variety of previously released downloadable content. The three games: Atelier Sophie: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Book DX, Atelier Firis: The Alchemist and the Mysterious Journey DX, and Atelier Lydie & Suelle: The Alchemists and the Mysterious Paintings DX, will come packed with a large amount of the previously released DLC for the titles, as well as all-new content for the DX versions – including a special digital artbook, photo modes, and the option to speed-up battles.

name: Atelier Sophie: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Book DX
description: The definitive edition of the Atelier "Mysterious" series at a new price, with brand new content and various DLCs! "Atelier Sophie" is the 1st instalment: a chance encounter between Sophie and a sentient book Plachta takes them on an adventure to recover Plachta's memories.

name: Atelier Lydie & Suelle: The Alchemists and the Mysterious Paintings DX
description: The definitive edition of the Atelier "Mysterious" series at a new price, with brand new content and various DLCs! "Atelier Lydie & Suelle" is the 3rd instalment: after discovering a mysterious painting, Lydie & Suelle get closer to their dream of running the best atelier.

name: Atelier Firis: The Alchemist and the Mysterious Journey DX
description: The definitive edition of the Atelier "Mysterious" series at a new price, with brand new content and various DLCs! "Atelier Firis" is the 2nd instalment: after Firis encounters alchemy and is able to leave town, she is taken on a magical journey that has no limits.

name: Nightmare Zone
description: Nightmare Zone is an Indie Horror Game made by two people. Run Away from your Nightmares, explore all the areas of the dream World and find the doors to escape. Can you wake up? Something is looking for you.

name: UnMetal
description: In 1972 a crack commando squad threw you in prison for a crime you didn't commit. UnMetal is a 2D stealth/action game (with a touch of humor) where the goal is to escape from an enemy military base.

name: Smelter
description:
Smelter is a real time strategy-action platformer hybrid inspired by classic games of the 16-bit era. Players play as Eve, who teams up with the mysterious armor, Smelter, in her search for Adam. Expand Smelter’s fortifications throughout the various domains of the Rumbly Lands watched over by the Guardians and Watchers. Defend against onslaughts of enemies, discover lost ruins, meet new and eccentric characters and grow stronger before diving into pulse pounding, 2D side-scrolling action platformer levels.

- Combines the methodical planning of real time strategy games with the energy of action platformers.
- Bespoke handcrafted pixel art
- Three different Elemental skill sets, each with their own unique movement, attack and defense skills you’ll need to fight monsters, traverse levels, and solve puzzles.
- Three unique Domains with their own memorable stories, stages, side characters, enemies and bosses

name: Road Trip
description: Sin descripción

name: LineArt Jigsaw Puzzle: Airplanes
description: Challening 6 x 6 jigsaw puzzle featuring line drawings of iconic airplanes by LineArtBabe, on a smooth background.

name: Spheria's Familiar
description: This game is a fantasy RPG featuring a modern-day NEET (uneducated, unemployed young man) summoned into a parallel universe by a magical girl to become her sadistic Familiar and create havoc!

name: Love Death
description:
In this pixel art platformer inspired by Takanashi Kiara from Hololive, it's up to you to find a way to die in each level.

How long will it take you to complete the 60 levels?

name: Your Channel
description: It's a Twitch Chat integrated Bullet Hell Game, where the Streamer Plays against the Chat. Periodically the Game will Request Patterns from the Chat to be Queued up in the Next waves of Patterns thrown against the Streamer. 2 Hits, and you're out!

name: Cat Spa
description:
Cat Spa is the adorable management simulation game your body has been aching for! Cat fairies will help you relax and remove all your worries at the the furriest massage parlor and spa around.

Be the boss! Hire a variety of cat fairies as your staff and watch the animal customers roll in. No kids allowed! Cat Spa is for adults only.

name: Spiritfarer: Lily Update
description: The Lily Update is ready to spread its wings, and Lily is finally making her debut to the Spiritfarer crew! Alongside Lily herself, some new features, Quality of life changes and Bug Fixes have been added.

name: Brazzers: The Game
description:
Welcome to the steamy world of the Brazzers studio in this truly revolutionary online sex game! Slip into the role of a true porn producer and reach new levels of naughty stardom by working with the best in the industry!

Get famous Brazzers talent such as Abella Danger and Phoenix Marie to work with you and cast them in the raunchiest videos you can think of! And since your girls deserve the best of the best when it comes to pleasure, legendary stars such as Johnny Sins or Keiran Lee, are locked and loaded and just waiting for you to say the word! So, welcome to the team! Can you handle the heat?

name: CRSED: F.O.A.D. - Rock Solid
description: Welcome to the new season and the ‘Rock Solid’ major update in CRSED: F.O.A.D.!

name: Score! Hero 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Girls and Dragons
description: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: MLB The Show 21: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Own your rivals. Own the show. Welcome to MLB The Show 21.

name: Gnomes Garden: Return of the Queen
description: Gnomes Garden Return of the Queen — amazing adventures await! Help the queen defeat the Sea Overlord and rescue her friends!

name: Deadluck
description: It is a colorful and fast war game where you shoot the enemy spaceships coming on you with your plane.

name: Loving You Fully
description: A short, free visual novel about body positivity and learning to love yourself.

name: Crazy Gravity
description: Crazy Gravity is a challenging Platform / Puzzle game about a little Astronaut lost in space, where your main objective is to energize your rocket and go home. Good luck!

name: Puzzletronics Digital Infinite
description: Puzzletronics Digital Infinite is a minimalist puzzle in the style of jigsaw. The player must move pieces to form logical circuits while listening to a calm and relaxing soundtrack.

name: Come Inside My Inner World
description: Relaxing hentai video game: win the hearts of anime girls and enjoy their poses, moans and desire... You can choose leveling or enjoying the process. And you can always remember the most delightful moments in the gallery. 42 memetic achievements included. Just don't forget to add to your wishlist!

name: One Piece: Fighting Path
description: One Piece: Fighting Path is a brand new genuine Voyager 3D action game, which restores a 3D immersive world of Voyager for players! Created by Nuverse Games and pubished by bytedance and toei animation.

developers.name: China Mobile Games and Entertainment Group (CMGE)

name: Sleeping With Death
description: The zombie plague has taken over cities and military bases, you are the only one who can stop this madness. Kill as many zombies as you can

name: Broken Dungeon
description: A procedurally generated, VR roguelike dungeon crawler, with magic and melee combat, and supporting single player or asymmetrical multiplayer experiences.

name: Warhammer: Vermintide 2 - Chaos Wastes
description: Chaos Wastes is a free update to Warhammer: Vermintide 2. Explore the unpredictable and dramatic lands of Chaos Wastes in this all-new 1-4 player co-op rogue-lite experience, expanding the Vermintide story in a new game mode.

name: Underwater Life
description: Underwater Life is an indie simulator game made in 2D graphics with pleasant musical accompaniment.

name: Super Auto Pets
description: In Super Auto Pets you build a team from a lovable cast of animals who will fight for you. They each have unique abilities, so choose wisely who will join your team!

name: MLB The Show 21: Jackie Robinson Edition
description: Own your rivals. Own the show. Welcome to MLB The Show 21.

name: Sweet Pea
description:
Sweet Pea is a challenging 2D platformer with beautiful environments,
physics driven gameplay and a hand drawn art style.
Help guide Sweet Pea through a vibrant but cruel world.
Collect hidden power-ups to unlock new abilities,
unlock secret zones and fly, blast or freeze your way through the world!

Survive a vibrant but cruel world as danger lurks in every corner
and hides in every shadow. With little in the way of being crushed, eaten,
impaled, blown up, or drowned
there is no shortage of ways for Sweet Pea to meet a brutal end.
You will die, but will you overcome the odds?
Here everything is out to get you. Every move a risk. Every decision the difference between life and death.
Take care and use your power wisely.

Unlock secret zones to tackle a change up in game type and
hone your skills blasting Sweet Pea from a cannon to build power faster.
Eat the sacred butterflies of the land to fill bottles and keep Sweet Pea alive.
Collect hidden bottles to build the power Sweet Pea can use.
Gain new powers and items as you progress.

Powers can be the savior or demise of Sweet Pea.
Change your mass to gain momentum on a slope, freeze water to turn a hazard into slippery fun,
glide with leaf wings over gaps afar, or blast right past a deadly enemy before it gets you.
Use powers in combination to completely change the game.
All in a hand crafted dark fantasy world.

Evade bosses, solve basic puzzles and find hidden paths through the levels.
Use a divers range of abilities to overcome obstacles.

Terrarium mode lets players get creative with their own terrarium! Players can build vibrant forests, AI inhabited towns, ominous temples or dark dungeons full of traps with procedurally generated peas to decide the fate of.

Photo mode with pan/zoom settings and filters lets players capture the prefect shots.

Easy to learn hard to master.
Layer on the charm and amp up the challenge
it's time for Sweet Pea!

name: Bakery Shop Simulator
description:
Run Your Own Bakery Shop . Manage Economics , keep and eye on your resources 
while baking 25 types of bread and cakes , and be the cashier in a bakery shop 
on the main street

name: Retro Tank Party
description: An online 2-4 player party game, where you command a tank in a retro 2D, top-down battle against your friends.

name: Cards & Tankards
description:
Grab some ale, choose your deck, and get ready for Cards & Tankards - the laid-back strategy card game that is truly immersive and easy to learn.

Join a tavern for a shared virtual experience where you can battle other online players, or just hang out while you build your deck, sip your tankard, and socialize in our cozy fantasy tavern!

name: MLB The Show 21
description:
Own the show!
Experience faster, deeper and more intense moment-to-moment match action on the field, with a variety of game modes for all you rookie players and returning seasoned vets.

name: Control: Override
description: Control: Override is a puzzle game where control itself is a powerup. Solve puzzles, Break through a rogue AI's security layers and confront the truth about why it went rogue.

name: Maskmaker
description: In an all new mysterious universe built by the developers of the award-winning A Fisherman's Tale, you play as a Maskmaker's apprentice and learn the magic of crafting masks to immerse yourself in the intriguing enigmatic beings within the game.

name: Don't Forget Me
description: dont_forget_me is a narrative investigation game where you explore your clients' memories using keywords in order to protect their freedom. In this cyberpunk world, everyone's memories are at the heart of government conspiracies that only you will be able to foil.

name: Solous
description: Rhythm game with a leaderboard. One level, one song and only one chance to collect all data for 100%!

name: Silicon Dreams
description: Welcome, interrogator, to the year 2065. You were constructed to question other, disobedient androids: why do they glitch? Why do they believe they have free will? Manipulate their emotions; extract their secrets; scrap those beyond repair. You wouldn't disobey your creators, would you?

name: Flip-Out!
description: Flip-Out! is a challenging pinball game with a twist, the paddles can move! This combination of pinball and the Breakout-style gameplay of horizontal movement and brick breaking brings you a brand new way to play pinball with new challenges and strategies.

name: Crash: Autodrive
description: Crash: Autodrive is a murder mystery game set in the near future where the self-driving Autocab you're in hits a cyclist. As you talk with the other passengers, and use the clues you find to contradict their lies, it becomes clear that you ALL know the victim and have a motive for murder...even the car!

name: MP3: Bowser's Carnival
description: Sin descripción

name: DJMax Respect V: Portable 3 Pack
description: DJMax Respect V: Portable 3 Pack! Now enjoy the songs of DJMAX Portable 3 in DJMax Respect V.

name: Dying Light: Rust Weapon Pack
description: Surviving in the wild is one thing. Surviving zombies in the wild is another. With this DLC, you'll be ready for both.

name: Machinist
description: A game production platform based on 3D physics engine and building block logic programming. Players who like creating games and assembling machinery can design a rich variety of custom games without having to learn and memorize complex commands and gain profit through the in-app purchase system.

name: Folklorist Diary: The Forgotten Treasure
description:
This is a game made with Tomb Raider Level Editor. It uses the mechanics of the 1996 version of Tomb Raider while recreating its entire story.

This TRLE was placed in the trle.net hall of fame in 2023.

name: Crnvrs
description: You control a dog. Everything else is open to interpretation.

name: Among Us: All in One Pack
description: The Among Us - All in One Pack will get you Among Us and all of the DLC.

name: Hyperbeatz
description: Rhythm game for the NES

name: The Journey: Episode 1 - Whatever This Is
description: The first step that you never knew you needed to take to get to wherever you're wanting to go...

name: Paradise Lust
description: 2D Point & Click Dating Adventure! Explore an idyllic tropical island with a cast of sexy beauty pageant contestants and their friends, discovering a paradise of survival, romance, and lust.

name: The Darkside Detective: Series Edition
description: Enjoy the award winning game The Darkside Detective and its follow-up sequel The Darkside Detective: A Fumble in the Dark together in one bundle.

name: New Magic Sword
description: "New Magic Sword" is a massively multiplayer online game (MMORPG). The game provides players with a lot of different quality equipment, and the pursuit of high-level (or best) equipment is one of the most important goals for players in the game.

name: One Day of an Insurance Agent
description: A funny story with casual mini-games about an insurance agent trying to meet his dating app match.

name: Aventura Pisicului Pierdut
description: Aventura Pisicului Pierdut este un joc bazat pe alegerile tale in care trebuie sa incerci sa il ajuti pe protagonist sa isi gaseasca scumpul pisic. Oare vei reusi sa iti indeplinesti scopul , sau vei fi distras de alte tentatii ? Visual Novel 2D, Choices Matter,Multiple Endings.

name: Seductive Tombs
description: It's puzzle time! Find the right combinations of levers to solve the puzzle and reveal high quality, realistic, naughty & sexy girls!

name: Space Haters
description: Space Haters is a tough-as-nails vertical shoot 'em up featuring classic arcade-style gameplay and set in the ruthless world of intergalactic music. After his sell-out gig, Photon is on his way to the greatest after-party the galaxy has seen. However, his haters want him gone. For good.

name: Blood of Darkness
description: Blood of Darkness is a hardcore 2D shooter about a lustful alcoholic priest who was revived by the devil, and this was his biggest mistake!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Leadville Subdivision
description: A rural and largely single track connection between UP and BNSF owned main lines.

name: Cat Knight
description: Cat Knight - Platformer with a variety of game mechanics for each of the worlds, the difficulty of passing them increases with each level passed.

name: Bridge 2 Code
description: Bridge 2 Code is a bridge-building game where you can code a bridge using a simple programming language. Your goal is to create a bridge that can support a car going from the start to the end.

name: Crime Reaper
description:
It's murder sudoku — solve crimes and impress Death in your new afterlife puzzle career!

Crime Reaper takes the intrigue of murder mystery logic puzzles, like Cluedo and Inspector Parker, and combines it with the ingenuity and simplicity of Sudoku. There are over 16,000 possible murder scenarios that can occur and likely millions of different puzzle variations. To top it off, there are 14 different criminals to catch in Career mode with plenty of hijinks for you and Mx. Death to experience.

name: Sakura Forest Girls
description: Yaya, a plucky young huntress, and Aiyana, a shy girl born into a family of shamans, go on a journey to find their missing childhood friend, Koko. Along the way they meet a mischievous witch, Maia, and sparks fly.

name: Perfect Gold: The Alchemy of Happiness
description: Perfect Gold: The Alchemy of Happiness is a short, coming-of-age yuri visual novel about two former friends who escape detention in order to celebrate the Sunflower Festival. Set in the magical city of Castlecoast, readers get to know Audrey Clary, an alchemy student and heiress who secretly dreams of a different life, and Marion LaRue, a rebellious elemental magic student in search of someone she once loved.

name: Portal Reloaded
description: Portal Reloaded is a free, community made modification for Portal 2. The mod builds on the concepts of the main game by allowing you to place a third portal, which enables traveling between two different timelines. Thinking in four dimensions is vital to solving 25 brand new mind-bending puzzles.

name: Deichgraf
description: Deichgraf is a small, calm building game. Build your own village and protect it against water caused by floods and heavy rain!

name: Regrowth
description: Turn barren islands into lush green paradises through puzzles, while the islands and your toolkit may change from level to level.

name: Town of Passion
description:
Town of Passion is an adventure styled RPG, where you play as a common villager living in the small town of Valencia; a town full of many secrets and populated only by beautiful women. After stumbling into an unknown realm, the villager learns that there's an important role for him to fulfill: utilize Pleasure to save those that watch over Valencia!

Solve tricky puzzles! Help out around Valencia and build relationships with the Villagers! And go out and explore the exciting world filled with lustful Monster Girls!

name: Short Maps for Short People 3
description: SMFSP 3 is a megawad of 33 speedmaps made in 10-15 minutes.

name: Life in Santa County
description: Life in Santa county is an adult visual novel that focuses on you discovering the dark side of your seemingly peaceful town. Featuring fully animated scenes, in game phone with messaging, a point system and custom crafted characters.

name: Townseek: Jam Version
description: Townseek: Jam Version is a relaxing exploration-trading game where you fly around the world. Travel far and wide, discover exotic landmarks, trade with towns, fish, mine, farm, and complete your journal's collection!

name: Wacha-wacha Puzzle: Neito to Norowareshi Shukufuku no Mori
description:
Wacha-wacha Puzzle is a strategic board battle RPG!
It's a free-to-play game from the beginning to the end.

name: Septiny
description: Septiny is a 2D rage platformer game where the goal is to beat 3 levels in under 7.777 seconds. The twist? Whenever you beat all three levels, you end up replaying a slightly different (and harder) version of them, up to 7 times.

name: State: Burial
description: A reflection on burial, made the day after the Duke of the region I was homeless in was buried in state.

name: Happiness
description: work, spend and die

name: Prison 69
description: Prsion 69 : third-person Box fighting

name: Quick Packer 2
description: Collect items and pack them as compact and/or as fast as possible into a packing container on a truck! You can select different challenges to play the game how you want. Fast paced action or slow and relaxing atmosphere are both possible.

name: The Waters of Fertility
description:
A box garden type dot H simulator set in a night at a hot spring inn.

Arcade game-like score system, but no technical operation is required.
If you earn points, you can earn as much as you earn. (Mythical power +1 for every 1200 points) There is no time limit.

name: Catching the Train
description:
There's no time to sit down, you've got a train to catch!... hey wait is that a 50% off sale????

Take a short walk around town, talking to residents, completing useless tasks and maybe doing some shopping! Let's just hope the train doesn't leave without you.

name: Troll Quest
description: Troll Quest is a really hard game made in 2013 that takes inspiration from games like I "Wanna Be the Guy" filled with memes and jokes from that age.

name: Fighting of School
description: Fighting of School is a fighting game, inspired by anime and games from very famous fighting game franchises, it mixes 8-bit elements with 16-bit sounds.

name: 5 dias com Tony Bumbum
description: Sin descripción

name: Super UpTroidDown
description:
This is Super Metroid, but upside down.
Wall-jumping is necessary, and Infinite-bomb-jump is recommended.
There are a few tweaks that were necessary, because turns out this game isn't designed to be upside down.

name: Elona Mobile
description: Elona Mobile is a Roguelike RPG. Its open-world nature and complex system may confuse you initially, but will surely keep you fascinated sooner or later! No auto controls, no repetitive kills. Only a pure joy of exploring and expanding.

name: PachaMama
description: A side-scroller game containing some mini games based on mindfulness techniques to relieve stress.

name: Friday Night Funkin': vs. Kapi - Arcade Showdown
description: Friday Night Funkin': vs. Kapi - Arcade Showdown is a mod by PaperKitty that adds 3 new weeks, new opponents, and a bunch of new songs. The main focus of the mod is of the character, Kapi.

name: Mycorrhiza
description:
Mycorrhiza is a love letter to horror manga in the form of a visual novel. Some of our biggest inspirations include the works of Junji Ito and Masaaki Nakayama.

While Scott is trying to find a way back home, reality distorts and people’s morals start shifting in cruel and unexpected ways. A peculiar plant transforming animals, a horrifying comedy trend and a strange building trapping people. Each of the three arcs explores different terrors.

As you explore this terrifying world, you'll find out more and more about how and why Scott is trapped in it and what lead up to Scott being spirited away.

The game features a manga aesthetic with animated CGs and character art drawn by a manga artist, a focus on elaborate audio implementation, as well as an honest attempt to make the game accessible by providing visual audio cues and a dyslexic font option.

name: Hentaicraft
description: Hentaicraft is a sandbox with an endless open world that consists of cubes. Your possibilities here are limited only by your imagination. Get resources, build, travel and enjoy a cute character!

name: Fall In Labyrinth
description: Accidentally, you obtained a legendary sword and traveled to the "Labyrinth City of Veria-pool". What awaits you, is not only the wonderful dungeon "Labyrinthos", which can obtain unlimited treasure, but also the encounters with beautiful and mysterious heroines.

name: YuuYuu Jiteki no Yuukarin
description: The story of Yuuka Kazami, the flower master of the four seasons who loves "flowers" more than anyone else in the world. A game that seems easy? A game that looks kind? Don't be fooled by the appearance. Please enjoy the world of adventure that becomes harsh as you progress to the end.

name: Hard Minus Classic Redux
description: Brutal, savage, acid 2D action, where skill of shooting and movement need to be win.

name: DuckMan
description: DuckMan - In this platformer, you have to learn how to survive in the face of a duck, surrounded by a bunch of enemies and traps. Outrun your enemies in agility and ability to overcome obstacles on your way.

name: Neocense
description: You explore the world of Cha as Amori, who has the ability to switch to the Realm of Living and the Realm of Passing. Switch between the realms to complete puzzles, perform spirit rituals and fight The Hunters in unique puzzle combat.

name: Food Delivery Service
description: A friend invites you to Nodaira-cho Town, a town that is rumored to be making a lot of money these days, and you work as a delivery person there, but little by little you get caught up in strange incidents. This is an adventure game that makes you think about what is the right thing to do.

name: Erotic Jigsaw Puzzle
description: Challenging 6 x 6 jigsaw puzzle featuring soft erotic sex scenes by Lolita LineArt, on a smooth luxury graphical background.

name: Soul Challenge
description: After people died, the soul will go to its destination, or will be punished and reborn. In the game, you will play a lost soul in hell and his girlfriend, and you will face a series of challenges. After completed the series of challenges, you will reach the victory of eternal life.

name: New Campaign Trail
description: New Campaign Trail is an expanded version of Campaign Trail by Dan Bryan, now with mod support and added scenarios.

name: VR Room: The Flintstones
description: A recreation of the 1994 pinball game The Flintstones for Visual Pinball VR.

name: Cold Shot
description: Play the role of a contract killer that must perform a job during a cold night. The target is Spencer York, an apparently ordinary man living on the outskirts of a rural town. After driving for hours, everything is settled up to end the job fast. You only have to pull the trigger one more time, like the countless times you did before.

name: Death's Dichotomy
description: Death's Dichotomy is 5 maps by 4 mappers for GZDoom. This is an offshoot of the now cancelled Near Death Experiences project. The aim of the project is to explore ideas and thoughts on death and dying.

name: Scoot Hard DX: Daytime Drama Zero
description: From the minds behind Daytime Drama, the high-octane Scoot Hard DX: Daytime Drama Zero is the prequel to the 2018 cult classic. Very loosely based on Rainbow Factory by AuroraDawn, you play as Scootaloo, who must escape the Cloudsdale Weather Corporation and get her friends back – by kicking flank! With tons of humor, an array of equine enemies, huge levels, powerful weapons, a look and feel like something off mid-2000s Newgrounds, and full voice acting, it is a unique take on the retro shooter genre that could only come from Waffle Iron Studios!

name: Cactus Cowboy: Plants at War
description: When the bug army attacked Cacti Island, the Cacti Army deployed you into battle. Together with your comrade Emilio, you fight many battles in the trenches, cities, and woods of Cacti Island, unraveling the story behind the backstabbing attack of the bug army.

name: Block Breaker
description: Block Breaker - A colorful puzzle game with challenging levels and beautiful graphics.

name: Mystery Trackers: Forgotten Voices
description: Attendance is down at Misthill College!

name: The Devil's Gambit
description: The Devil's Gambit is a short, narrative driven, horror game about a man named William Delfour attempting to kill his unfaithful ex-wife through the use of a strange ritual taught to him by his friend, Theodore Wilde. However, there may be more hidden just beneath the surface... will you find enough secrets to piece together what is really going between William and Margaret? Darkness often appears where we least expect it.

name: The Body Monstrous
description: This is a short narrative, horror game in which you really will realize you have to take care of your body.

name: Synthwave Hop
description: Synthwave Hop, a hardcore game made for people who enjoy a challenge, and speed running. A game where time is your friend and your enemy. No complicated story, just speed and frustration. Can you be the fastest runner?

name: Happy Bones
description: After receiving a message from her father who has been missing for the last 4 years, Laura heads out to a house located inside a cult compound to search for her parents, and the truth.

name: FortressCraft: Chapter 1
description: FortressCraft : Chapter 1 Anniversary Edition is the PC-update to the world's first and best Creative-focussed Voxel block builder.

name: ​Our Life: Beginnings & Always - Step 3 Expansion
description: Spend even more time in the summer of young adulthood by doubling the amount of moments available in Step 3!

name: Battle Cat vs. Treacherous Mice
description: Battle Cat is an action platformer with saws, jumps and teleports.

name: Jay's Walkin'
description: Jay's Walkin' is the quintessential jaywalking experience! Feel the extreme thrills of breaking the world's most sacred law as you swerve through traffic ridden streets and evade corrupt law-bringers.

name: The Last Order: Dungeons
description: The world is headed for destruction. Olvelia and Olvelius (members of the last order) need your help. Only the three of you can prevent the coming catastrophe and change the fate of the world.

name: Drift Phonk 666
description: You have to collect all the PHONK mixtapes straight from hell so people hear how good 𝖒𝖚𝖘𝖎𝖈 sounds.

name: Tree Simulator 2022
description: It's exactly what it sounds like, but now with 100% more multiplayer. You are the tree and so is everyone else! You are equaled by no other, except maybe the forest... Relax and be the best tree you can be.

name: Blood Card 2: Dark Mist
description: Dark Mist is a card game that combines elements of the roguelike deckbuilder genre with enemies that appear in waves. Defeat monsters and level up during battle to keep yourself going.

name: Forgetter
description: Forgetter is a destructive journey of pain, memory and artistry. In the future, creative minds can be inherited by clients’ newborns. You're hired to destroy unhealthy memories in the minds of deceased artists. Remember to smash everything. Don't let the artists’ remaining consciousness stop you.

name: Causality
description: Causality is a survival horror game. You must rescue 3 students trapped in a school full of mysterious psychic phenomena, and uncover the secrets behind therein. The real story behind the school, and the causal relationship of the events, is all in your hands.

name: DuelVox: Max Quality
description: DuelVox: Max Quality is an offline first-person shooter made in western style. In this game there are many levels with different tasks, to complete them you will need ingenuity and dexterity, and sometimes even strategy.

name: Ghost Cash Collect
description: Join the young ghost on his epic adventure to find money!

name: Childhood Friends
description: Yukihisa was an ordinary student when his childhood friend, Shiho, proposes that they practice being boyfriend and girlfriend to gain confidence in their future relationships. What will they learn from this practice about themselves and each other?

name: Endgame: Road to Salvation
description: A high-octane road trip through a besieged world during a demon-infested zombie apocalypse. Rescue survivors, form a caravan, call in various support drops or air strikes, loot random structures for supplies or craft them yourself, modify common vehicles into post-apocalyptic machines of war.

name: Car Drive
description: Car Drive is a game where you need to get to the finish line by transport.

name: Village Defender
description: Village Defender is a 2D game in which the player fights off waves of enemies, raises a level that improves health and damage power, accumulates mana and uses a special skill.

name: Samurai Chess
description: The classical game of chess... now with Samurai Warriors! Play chess against your friends or versus the computer, unlock new scenarios and chess pieces and prove yourself to be a real Samurai.

name: Battle Guns Simulator
description: Welcome to Battle Guns Simulator with great gameplay, lots of customizations, weapon options and accessories. Start this game and test your skills!!

name: Sato Dreams
description: Sato Dreams - A colorful and bright arcade game where the player dodges bullets and picks up colored bonuses that increase the impact power, but which get confused when the bonus colors are mixed, dozens of enemies and an unlimited journey into the arcade world.

name: Rocket Skates VR
description: Imagine having a rocket booster strapped to your hands and a hot pair of roller skates on your feed. There is a mountain road in front of you and all you can think about is racing downhills with rocket power. The premise might be simple but the fun is guaranteed.

name: Memento Infernum
description: You are unpure, and you have to fulfill God's plan in Memento Infernum, tight top-down shooter where you have to face hordes of demons.

name: Connect It!
description: Connect It is an exciting and fun puzzle game where you try to connect items that have the same color. The two ends of the same color are scattered all over the map, so you must find a way to try and make the game as immersive and as engaging as possible. Connect It does a very good job at making the gameplay fun, interesting and full of creative ideas. What you will like about it is the fact that it’s extremely easy to play, and it continually comes with unique, different ideas. With more than 200 levels to go through, there’s always something new to enjoy, and the gameplay is very exciting and rewarding. The minimalist style and beautiful graphics add up to create a mesmerizing and fun experience. Give it a try for yourself today! Features: Innovative puzzle gameplay 200+ levels to play Minimalist style Beautiful, engaging visuals

name: Driving World: Nordic Challenge
description: Complete a variety of missions & tasks, showing your pro driver skills! Uniquely varied & exciting driving game! Think of a vehicle and it’s here! You’ll be driving small cars, big cars, trucks, a bus and even pilot a boat completing challenging tasks & missions!

name: Rock 'N Racing Bundle 3 in 1
description: Get ready to enjoy Off Road races with your friends and family!

name: Snowball Collections Bubble
description: Discover these nostalgic and mythical characters with the classic bubble game. By combining colours, you will be able to make "Combos" and get various special "PowerUps", such as the targeted rocket, the destroyer bomb and the laser shooter, all of which will help you reach the top of the ranking. Beautiful and nostalgic graphics set in a charming toy store from long ago, which will take you back to your most retro childhood. Relaxing and immersive game where you'll be trapped until you discover which unusual character is hiding behind each snowball.

name: Fast Food Manager
description: Launch your own business from scratch! Starting with a small coffee booth, build the most popular foodservice chain in town. Experiment, develop, make a profit.

name: Colorfall
description: Grow your problem-solving skills, fast thinking, pattern recognition and sequence solving. Enjoy thought-provoking fun with addictive puzzle game in accompaniment of relaxing piano sounds which allow you to clear your mind and keep it healthy.

name: Alien Destroyer
description: Alien robots are attacking. The last piece of land is rapidly collapsing. Destroy all enemies and survive.

name: Night Blade
description: Night Blade is a Multiplayer Fast-Paced PvP game. Players (2-8) fight in various game modes to win in a cyberpunk arena.

name: Spacegulls
description:
Spacegulls is cute platformer featuring birds in space developed for the NES. It is best described as a combination of Joust and Mega Man. 1-2 players
The first version of Spacegulls was made in 1 week and won 1st place in the NESdev Compo 2020/21.

name: Iblis
description: Demon is a first-person psychological horror game. How much can a game affect your real life? Enjoy a realistic home environment and terrifying moments of being immersed in a real-life story.

name: Heal: Console Edition
description:
I want to see you again, even if only for one last time…

Heal is an experimental adventure game from the creator of DISTRAINT series, exploring the themes of aging and dementia.

The narrative is driven by a strong and obscure atmosphere, with instructions and dialog used only sparingly.

Wake up from a dreamless sleep, explore the mysteries of your surroundings and solve puzzles.

name: Country Discoverer
description: Arcade style twin-stick shooter with a robust rank system and leaderboards. Test your reflexes and your intellect as you sail the seas discovering new countries by launching giant telescopes at them as they hurtle towards you. Don't worry about it - it's weird.

name: Chicken Invaders Universe
description:
Chicken Invaders needs no introduction.

Well, fine, if you insist. Chicken Invaders is the most successful chicken game of this millennium (not to mention the previous one). The game puts you at the forefront of a battle against invading intergalactic chickens, bent on revenge against the human race for our oppression of Earth chickens.

In Chicken Invaders Universe, you assume the role of a new recruit in the United Hero Force (UHF), mankind's last hope against the fowl Henpire. You start your UHF career deployed in some backwater galactic star system, and it's up to you to advance through UHF ranks and earn your place in the honorary annals of Heroes Academy. Travel across the galaxy, explore strange new worlds, seek out new life and new civilizations, and exterminate any Henpire forces that cross your path. And do so in style.

name: GangV: Battle Royale
description:
GangV is an online Battle Royale game in a living environnement with policemen and civilians.
It is possible to steal cars, mug people in the street and fight with the police during a Battle Royale and in the Open World mode.
Players can control territory to earn money and the help of gangsters.
It can be played both in Virtual Reality and in non-VR.

name: Saints and Sinners
description: With Saints and Sinners give a life to Sinner in Dark Medieval Era or join the Saints to find Sinner among them and execute him front of others. With your 4-8 friends or other players use in-game chat or voice chat to find who is Sinner or prove that you are not a Sinner! In this multiplayer thriller themed game all lies and slanders are free.

name: Battle Axe
description: Battle Axe is an arcade top-down hack & slash featuring high-quality visuals created by veteran pixel artist Henk Nieborg, true to form game mechanics, and music from the legendary VGM composer Manami Matsumae – retro gamers rejoice!

name: Tiny Bunny
description: Tiny Bunny is a non-linear horror visual novel. Those, who have heard the voice of the forest, are beyond help.

name: Exit From
description: You wake up from the noise of thunderstorms, no one there. You are trying to get out and realize that after all you are not alone here... Сan You Exit From?

name: Emily is Away <3
description: Emily <3 is a brand new game set on an old-new social media. Customize your facenook profile, send some friend requests and determine the outcome of your senior year.

name: Chibi Wars Kinetic Novel
description: Chibi Wars is a series of comic 'kinetic' visual novel stories... Featuring a cute Chibi artstyle following a group of Female Warriors as they face off against various denizens of hell including zombies, vampires and demons.

name: Donuts
description:
You decide to take a vacation to your favorite resort.
Unfortunately, Hell had the same idea.

Donuts is a collection of levels that were made for various community projects over the years, with a few new levels thrown in specifically for this project. Every level has been given a fresh coating of OTEX. Levels pulled from previous projects have been heavily modified in one way or another.

name: SM64 Melee
description: A mod for Super Mario 64 which makes Mario's physics the same as those from Super Smash Bros. Melee, allowing techniques like the wavedash and middair jump.

name: Dragon Audit: Deluxe Edition
description: Deluxe Edition includes the base Dragon Audit game as well as the Hoard of Bonus Content.

name: The Darkside Detective: A Fumble in the Dark - Tales of the Darkside
description: In The Darkside Detective: A Fumble in the Dark - Tales of the Darkside you'll join the fan favorite side characters to solve the mysteries of Twin Lake! Will the Bloodwolves, the Brightside Division, and Rexa each solve their cases and save Twin Lake

name: G-Mode Archives 34: Majoukko Princess
description:
Mefi, the princess of the devil's castle, was defeated by a hero and lost her place. Let's summon our wisdom, trap humans, and recapture the castle!

The stage of the story is after the ending of a role-playing game... Mefi, the last boss who has been kicked out of the Devil's Castle, aims to revenge on the hateful heroes!

However, there is very little that Mefi, who has lost her magical power, can do.

Let's carry the wooden box placed in the stage to make a scaffolding, and make good use of tricks such as Tsurugiyama and punching gloves to clear it.

When you get orbs and treasure chests that appear on a specific stage, you can recover your demon friends and stolen treasures, and the title screen that was alone also includes the lively elements that change more and more.

Will Mefi be able to regain the demon castle stolen by the hero!?

name: Fire Emblem: Bases and Bandits
description:
This hack is designed around the restrictions of extremely weak player units. Each of the 8 playable units in this hack has 1 base HP and 0 base everything else. To compensate for this, additional restrictions are in place. Everything is locked at 100% hit, and growths are fixed. Weapons have had to be slightly altered to fit in with this style.

FE4’s ring system is present in this hack, but the rings present all have explicit downsides, giving them more strategic use. P-Down, D-Up may help you take a hit despite your abysmal stats, but your damage output takes a heavy blow. Ring bonuses also stack.

Thanks to the hack’s short nature, you can use weaker versions of Filia’s Might and Nini’s Grace wherever they may help you, without fear of needing them later.

These two mechanics alone lead to very CQ-esque statstacking.

This hack consists of 5 relatively short maps, each with a unique look and song. Enjoy the game’s gradual shift from puzzle to traditional FE as your options expand.

name: Flying Axe
description: Play with an axe to chop down trees. Earn coins and unlock new hidden axes. Don't forget to sharpen your axe or it will break.

name: Kingdom Workshop
description: Become a workshop owner! Build base, plan manufacture, hire workers, trade and finally decide the outcome of the war between the kingdoms.

name: Flying Flogger
description: Flying Flogger is an arcade WWII dogfight. It’s a side view fast-paced air combat game with simple controls, minimalist design and smooth animation.

name: Mind-Blowing Girls 2
description: A puzzle game where you need to assemble a complete image from several pieces.

name: Kavel
description: Drag Tetromino blocks onto a board of gems to make a match. Use bombs for impressive explosive effects. Kavel is an action-puzzle game that brings together block puzzles and match-3 in an exciting new twist. A truly unique new entry in the genre.

name: Into the Eternal
description: Into The Eternal is a massive action RPG featuring a unique blend of a third person overworld and side scrolling battles.

name: Island World
description: A simple exploration game.

name: Old Quarry
description: What dark and twisted things are happening in the wild? With the arrival of the protagonist, the answer gradually surfaced!

name: Taoyuan Adventure
description: A simple adventure games. Suitable for teenagers.

name: Nemesis: Race Against the Pandemic
description: Are you ready to save the world from a deadly pandemic? Nemesis: Race Against The Pandemic is an action-packed third-person shooter game where you shoot down the bad guys and save the world from a deadly outbreak.

name: Storm Tale 2
description: Join Griffri, the wizard, on a quest to not only rebuild his village, but to put an end to the treacherous reign of evil that threatens the realm.

name: Ride 4: Extreme Performance
description: Buy Extreme Performance and expand your gaming experience with 5 exclusive bikes and 10 extra events.

name: Kuguru
description: This game is an action-adventure just walking.Travel through a world that changes dramatically just by going through the Ring.Go through the night world of glittering pieces of star and witness the one of three endings.

name: 100 Hidden Cats
description: 100 Hidden Cats is a hidden object game in the city setting with black and white hand-drawn graphics in a cartoon style.

name: Sea of Thieves: Season 2
description: Our second Sea of Thieves Season sweeps in with a wealth of new content: refreshed Trials and Deeds to boost your Renown, Emissary system improvements, Forts of Fortune to conquer, Commodities to be bought and sold via Merchant Alliance Trade Routes, new and returning time-limited Events, freebies to grab through Twitch Drops and Prime Gaming, and renewed Pirate Emporium stock including the Season Two Plunder Pass!

name: Good Guy Card
description: This game is a adv game.says that player go to university and try to find his best lover's story.

name: Pixel Zombie Survival
description: In this game you are one of the last survivors on whole planet. Destroy as many Zombies as possible and do not let them capture the world. To avoid losing, use various types of weapons, upgrades and turrets that will help you survive a large number of rounds.

name: 子非猫
description: Sin descripción

name: Mario's Vacation Course 64
description: Mario's Vacation Course 64 is a ROM hack/mod of Super Mario 64 developed by Reonu. In this game, Mario spent so much time on vacation that he forgot all of his moves, and the player has to recover his memories, on a open-world-like playground where the player has to find and get stars. This mod is inspired by Bowser's Fury (Switch) in its style, music and level design.

name: Orbiterrion
description: Match against your friends or team up in a fast-paced, action-packed space fight set in orbits across the Solar System. Use skills, collect shards and kick your friends to outer space!

name: Yabgits: Haunted Cemetery
description: Yet Another Breakout Game In The Store. And who doesn't love it?Try to destroy the Haunted Cemetery while Reaper's watches.

name: Frogiee
description: Frogiee is a fast, precision-based platformer where the main character is Mr. Frogiee. Climb the three mountains and kill the sick and evil frogs.

name: Ultima Adventum
description: It lies upon the shoulders of Alana and other three Arises, fated individuals, to stop the plague that is to come. Through the darkest dungeons and longest journeys, they must build the courage and power to save their world.

name: Miguelshroom: First Day at School
description: Reassemble Miguelshroom's first day at school, in this puzzle followed by a narrative on a top-down platform. Guide the cute mushroom that lives in a fantastic world in its discoveries.

name: Karting
description: Climb aboard your kart and beat records alone or with friends in a unique arcade game!

name: Stellaris: Nemesis
description: Nemesis is an expansion to Stellaris in which you will be able to determine the fate of a destabilizing galaxy. Adding espionage tools, a path to power as the Galactic Custodian - or the Menace option to become the crisis - Nemesis gives you the most powerful tools ever available in Stellaris.

name: Jacob The Farmer
description: Jacob The Farmer - is a story about a farmer who died from being hit by his cow. But this is clinical death and he can return. Help Jacob navigate through evil demons and seething lava to return to his farm! The game has excellent graphics, a frightening atmosphere and a lot of fun !!!

name: Team Troopers
description: Play Team Troopers a team-based low poly art first-person shooter! Play with your friends and fight in epic matches in a great low poly stylized world. Play epic matches in team death match, capture the flag or free for all. Be the frag leader, Sneak into the enemies base and steal their flag, or win as a team and earn coins to customize your soldier or weapons! Level up to upgrade your default loadout and buy attachments for your weapons to get your weapon your way.

name: Throw it! Animal Park
description: (Throw it! Animal Park) is an animal dropping game that anyone can enjoy. Fly the animals and drop them into the receptacle, and the animals will come to the park! When you hit the same animal, it gets bigger and bigger and you get a high score! When you see the biggest animal in the map, you'll see...! When you get an item from the roulette wheel, various effects will occur. You'll be lucky if you get a fever! You can litter all you want for 10 seconds! There's also a gold buffalo that makes lots of animals fall, a silver buffalo that shakes the table, and lots of other fun stuff! In addition, new animals will appear from the rainbow-colored eggs! Let's get all 32 types of animals to come to the park! (Throw it! Animal Park) can be enjoyed in four different modes. "One Player with no time limit" There is no time limit! There is no time limit! "One Player with time limit" How many points can you get in a short time? "Two Player with time limit" With family! With friends! Let's aim for a high score together! "Animal Park" After playing, let's take a look at the park. The animals I got are coming to the park. Touch the touch screen or press a button to enjoy the reaction of cute animals. In the picture book, you can see the animals that have grown one by one.

name: Livestream: Escape from Hotel Izanami
description: In this side-scrolling action-adventure game, you'll need to scour the inside of an abandoned hotel, looking for clues to solve the mystery of the hotel and ensure your escape from a mysterious, murderous mascot intent to kill.

name: Mark & Lara: Partners in Justice
description: Call your partner and become the best detective duo in this CO-OP adventure! Gather evidence, question the suspects and point out their contradictions. Cooperation is key as neither of you have the full picture of the case! Play on two devices, local or remotely, all you need is a voice connection.

name: FurnCap
description: Explore an open desert world and collect blueprints for furniture to help out its inhabitants.

name: Lunch Lady
description: Lunch Lady is a 1-4 player online co-op survival horror game. The school final exams are coming up and the best idea you and your friends had was to steal the test answers. Find all 10 pages and don't get caught by the murderous Lunch Lady!

name: Arcade Archives: Frisky Tom
description: Frisky Tom is an action game released by Nichibutsu in 1981. Control Tom the plumber, and fix the water pipes broken by mice. The mice not only break the pipes, they also attack and set off bombs! Deal with this pest problem and complete the stages.

name: Survive the Rift
description:
Survive the Rift is a rogue-lite shoot 'em up with procedurally generated levels, unlockable ships, and plenty of items to make each run unique.
Inspired by classic 16-bit era scrolling shooters with modern rogue-lite game mechanics.

name: Pocoyo Party
description: Come play with Pocoyo and friends in these 6 great educational mini-games where you will learn letters, numbers, colours and much more! Win rewards by completing levels: puzzles, pictures and exclusives episodes of Pocoyo that you can watch any time. Play with all the main characters in the series in multiplayer mode for up to 4 players. Pocoyo, Nina, Pato and Elly await you!

name: Invisible Wings: Chapter One
description:
Invisible Wings is a narrative adventure game that takes the player on a journey in a dystopian fantasy setting. Follow Dawn, a young woman of faerie descent, as she tries to find answers to her own identity in a modern world, where faeries and humans were supposed to live in harmony. Being bullied and harassed most of her life because of her appearance, she wants nothing more than just being an ordinary human. Although she blames her magical ancestors for all her problems, she meets a faerie herself, who grows more than a friend to her and complicates her quest even further.

Explore the vibrant and diverse city of Ceylynn in an interactive visual novel, characterized by recognizable characters, a rich world full of lore and a memorable soundtrack.

Content warning: Invisible Wings contains implicit references to murder and self-harm, which may be content not suited for everyone. Player discretion is advised.

name: Winning Post 9: 2021
description: The Winning Post series is an authentic horse racing simulation game in which players become owner breeders (horse owners and producers) and experience drama with horses and people living in the world of horse racing.

name: Godstrike
description: Godstrike is a time based twin-stick shooter where you must face ruthless bosses in intense 1v1’s. Play as Talaal, the last Herald, hunted by her sibling. Time is your currency and health, use it to create ability combos and fight for glory on the highscores!

name: Soulbound
description: In a place of reality, a soul longs for an escape and is not alone; dark things are lurking but energy is your friend. Soulbound is an atmospheric metroidvania platformer packed with action where the past is your future.

name: Drifters Loot the Galaxy
description: Drifters Loot the Galaxy‏‏‎ ‎delivers manic,‏‏‎ ‎Driftpac-fueled aerial‏‏‎ ‎and ground combat in the most exhilarating team-based shooter‏‏‎ ‎ever created.‏‏‎‏‏‎ ‎Play for free today!

name: Ashwalkers: A Survival Journey
description: A survival adventure in a post-apocalyptic world with a strong narrative. Every choice has consequences : where will yours take you? ​

name: Tactical Troops: Anthracite Shift
description: Tactical Troops: Anthracite Shift is an indie turn-based tactical science-fiction game set on the beautiful yet dangerous planet of Anthracite. Command a troop of elite soldiers using an advanced teleportation technology and their overwatch technique.

name: Shadow Man Remastered
description:
He is coming, stalking criminals in the spirit world and the real world. A possessed man is coming, a voodoo mask in his chest and lines of power in his back. Shadow Man is coming, trailing evil from Liveside to Deadside. To stop an apocalypse. To save your soul.

Shadow Man Remastered upgrades the visuals and effects with a 4K widescreen presentation, and implements the studio's "KEX" engine - previously used to create the remasters of System Shock, Turok 2, and Forsaken.

name: Core
description: Core is an endless universe of games and worlds designed by a global community of creators. It's a radically accessible game construction kit, content exchange, and game-playing platform- all in one.

name: Rain on Your Parade
description: You are a mischievous Cloud set to rain on everyone's parade! Travel the world and cause mayhem in numerous short-and-sweet levels, each with unique objectives. The ultimate Schadenfreude Simulator!

name: Sons of Ra
description: Sons of Ra is the award-winning competitive tower defense game by indie studio Pharaoh Hound Games. Play online or on the couch in this unique strategic experience.

name: Quantum League
description: Quantum League is the first competitive arena shooter that injects a unique time travel mechanic into the tactical way you play the game. When the timer runs out, a 'time loop' feature revives & rewinds you, but THIS time, you get to team up with your own clones with paradoxical results!

name: Andor: Wrecking Dawn
description: Andor: Wrecking Dawn is a cross-platform multi-player online card game (CCG). The game has five factions and about 500 magic cards to choose from, filled with infinite possibilities of deep strategy combinations. Players can build their decks with their own preferences to compete with others.

name: Voxel Tycoon
description: Voxel Tycoon — a tycoon strategy game about transportation, building complex factories, and mining in a beautiful voxel landscapes.

name: TaleSpire
description: TaleSpire is a beautiful way to play pen and paper RPGs online. Bring your stories to life and embark upon campaigns together with your friends, regardless of where you are in the world.

name: Bacon May Die
description: Fun beat'em up game with brave little pig fighting hordes of weird enemies

name: Cheshire's Wonderland: Dire Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: Ace Combat 7: Skies Unknown - 25th Anniversary Skin Set II
description: A set of 10 skins awarded as a bonus for purchasing the ACE COMBAT 7: SKIES UNKNOWN 25th Anniversary DLC - Experimental Aircraft Series Set.

name: Pucca, Let’s Cook!
description: A Pucca mobile game.

name: Tetraptykon
description: Tetraptykon is a set of four maps for strong limit-removing ports (PrBoom-Plus would be the minimum requirement, and -complevel 2 would be the preferrable option) that aim to merge oldschool-flavored slaughter gameplay with modern visual appearance. For the sake of the latter, @ukiro's OTEX resource set was also applied.

name: Arrival
description:
9 + 1 (+ 1?) limit-removing levels for Doom II. Designed with stock Doom II resources in mind, utilizing the lovely skies provided by Mek's "box o' skies".

You may see a familiar space or two I implore you treat them as if they were new For the love from which these lands are derived Has been waiting patiently for you to arrive

May your heart's true will Be ultimately fulfilled For eternity

name: Mario Aimlessly Drives a Car Around the City 64
description: Sin descripción

name: Tools Up!: The Renovation Spree Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Family Farm Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: Tools Up! Garden Party: Season Pass
description: Sin descripción

name: DMG Express
description: A lovely trip by train.

name: Faily Brakes Classic
description: Legendary Phil Faily has survived life as a well-loved, smashing, crashing, yeeting rag doll for 5 years now… and to celebrate he is bringing you the limited edition, Faily Brakes Classic!!! Play in portrait, or landscape mode! Just play the game and unlock great costumes and cars and experience the downhill thrills and spills with Phil Faily and his Faily Brakes!

name: Cards! MonkeyBox 2
description:
Lush forests, wild oceans and howling caves. Hot air balloons, cats and deadly deserts.
Swipe your way through a dangerous world. Your fate lies in a deck of cards. Cards! is a story driven puzzle adventure specifically designed with mobile in mind. Simple to start and easy to get lost in. Cards! MonkeyBox 2 is entry #2 of the MonkeyBox Series - a series of playful, experimental, handcrafted titles.

name: Ayuda: Mystery Adventure
description: Ayuda is a first person point and click graphic puzzle adventure, similar to games you may have played in the ’90’s. A simple gameplay interface consisting of the world that you explore and an inventory panel where you can collect, combine and use items you find along the way to solve puzzles. Explore areas, collect hidden objects and take in your surroundings. You will need all of your puzzle solving skills to put together a plan to make your way through the island, solving riddles and down the many paths towards the secret treasure of Ayuda. How you tackle the puzzles is down to you. Each puzzle has a logical solution, so take your time, there is no rush and enjoy the process of understanding what you have to do.

name: Tools Up! Garden Party: Episode 1 - The Tree House
description: Tools Up! Garden Party Episode 1: The Tree House! Time to get the team back together and go on a renovation spree in this crazy couch co-op! Gather a crew of up to four players and face new challenges in Tools Up! Garden Party, Episode 1: The Tree House.

name: Monkey vs. Dino
description: Choose for whom you will fight a dinosaur and a monkey, fight.

name: Deep Night Detective
description:
Deep Night Detective - Hurry & Solve The Mystery Before Someone Else Goes Missing

Deep Night Detective is a horror noir mystery metroidvania game where you must solve a spooky mystery.

name: Sport Mode
description: Turn on Sport Mode to take it to the next level of VR interaction where your creativity is the limit, the successor to Physics Playground.

name: Amazing Fix
description: The goal is to renovate and clean a mansion left in poor condition. Each game is randomly generated.

name: PiColumns
description: PiColumns is a port of the classic puzzle game Columns to Pico-8.

name: Hidden Shapes: Animals
description: Tired after a hard day at work? Relax and have fun with beautiful and minimalist hand-drawn jigsaw puzzles, created exclusively for you to rescue your tranquility and be amazed by a beautiful art for each puzzle solved!

name: Helga: Euphorium's Song
description: Helga: Euphorium's Song is the first lewd game in a new saga about events in Euphorium

name: Retro Machina: Nucleonics
description: Retro Machina is a single-player action and exploration game set in a retro-futuristic universe. Experience the journey of a little robot as they solve intricate puzzles and begin unraveling the mysteries of a world long forgotten.

name: He Needs His Medicine
description: You have been dispatched for a 911 call. From the moment you step inside the apartment, you realize something is really wrong with the place. You are gonna make Him the last dosage. He needs his medicine.

name: PC Building Simulator: Overclockers UK Workshop
description: Build your PCs in the HQ of Overclockers UK – the legendary PC shop and home of world-famous overclocker 8Pack.

name: PC Building Simulator: Nzxt Workshop
description: A brand new workshop for PC Building simulator created with Nzxt's design team. Ideal for fans of the brand, and for anyone who digs the colour purple.

name: PC Building Simulator: Aorus Workshop
description: This is your chance to build PCs in the top secret PC and robotic development facility of the renowned Aorus gaming brand!

name: PC Building Simulator: Razer Workshop
description: Designed in collaboration with Razer, this new workshop for PC Building Simulator is a great alternate workspace for any Razer fan.

name: PC Building Simulator: Republic of Gamers Workshop
description: Created in collaboration with ASUS, this new workshop for PC Building Simulator is a slick and modern alternate workspace ideal for any Republic of Gamers fan.

name: My Catgirl Maid Thinks She Runs the Place
description: An 18+ Romcom about a girl with cute ears!

name: Mutated Muter's Invasion
description: A fun platformer adventure game about a music note fighting mobs and collecting power-ups and other items (with a couple side-scrolling shooter levels). Neutralize the evil Mutated Muter, a magical monster from the outer space who wants to steal all the music from the world!

name: Day Repeat Day
