description: It's an interactive story and a match-3 game that takes you through life.

name: Yumper
description:
This is a single player, fast paced platformer with projectiles.

Jump with A, and talk / shoot with B.

name: Blood Void Mass
description: Create and feed blood spikes.

name: Til Nord
description: Discover a sublime open world on your snowmobile! Drive among the frozen environment of Snøfall øyer to discover beautiful vistas, time trials and quests that permanently change the open world in Til Nord.

name: Pale Cachexia
description: A Gothic fantasy tale of loneliness, dark secrets, and the search for a cure.

name: Good Lookin Home Cookin
description:
Play as Jessica and Amira, childhood best friends, running their dream food court during the busy month of Ramadan.

Will their friendship withstand the pressure?

Or will the stress of running a business together shut down the GLHC food court for good?

You decide.

name: Myastere -Ruins of Deazniff-
description: Metroidvania-style spring wire action! 2D side-scroller that uses wires to explore ruins in all directions Steampunk retrospective that connects ancient history and modern times Eliminate the global crisis stirring in the ruins through investigative action!

name: SaGa Frontier Remastered
description: The beloved 1998 RPG Classic, SaGa Frontier, is reborn with improved graphics, additional features, and a new main character!

name: Forgotten Fields
description: Forgotten Fields is a game about a struggling author who travels back to his childhood home one last time before it's sold off. Visit old friends, relive memories and experience bursts of inspiration in this nostalgic game about the passage of time.

name: Finders Reapers
description: It’s time to step up and take back the world from the clutches of enemy hands in this co-op looting, shooting, selling, base-building, RTS! Invite your friend for some co-op campaign or go it alone. Think you have what it takes to build an impressive base on wheels?

name: Tasomachi: Behind the Twilight
description:
Yukumo is a young girl who travels around in her airship, her pride and joy. When visiting a particular Far Eastern town to run some errands her airship suddenly breaks down. She decides to explore the town to search for parts for repair; however, the town has fallen silent with no trace of the people who live there, the only inhabitants being a strange cat-like species...
Tasomachi is an adventure game in which you can freely explore an Far Eastern Fantasy town. You will control Yukumo as you explore the mysterious town, clear dungeons and collect items in order to fix your broken down airship.

name: Blocksplode
description: Blocksplode is an explosive physics-based puzzle game. Your goal is to blow up the building block structures and leave as a little as possible standing above the water level.

name: Curves
description: "Curves" is inspired by the winter sports skeleton. Try to make the difference in milliseconds on the track.

name: The Darkside Detective: A Fumble in the Dark
description: Delouse your room with sage and pack up your travel-sized ouija board, it's time to re-enter Twin Lakes - America's 34th most haunted city. Join Detective McQueen as he puzzles his way through 6 chilling cases, risking life and pixelated limb to solve the macabre mysteries that plague the poor town.

name: Schlo Pink and Purple
description:
Help Leila Crestcoft, a straight guy living in a culture of genetically engineered gay men, find a boyfriend to prove a point while simultaneously fooling members of an exclusive group that he is one of them.

The fifth installment of the schlo series is a dating sim rather independent from the rest of the schlo timeline, featuring many new characters as well as familiar ones. It could technically take place around the end of Schlo: Final Stand.

The focus of the game is on the Great Twelve descendants, a special group of humans living with the schlos. With 13 endings and a variety of antics sprinkled into a dating sim setting, the game should be at least a couple hours of fun.

The music was done by strawberry peeler.

name: Ultimate S
description: A large overhaul of Super Smash Bros. Ultimate.

name: Bare Witness
description: Bare Witness is an adult visual novel that will have multiple endings, in which choices will play a major part in how the story resolves.

name: Ghostrunner: Metal Ox Pack
description:
The Metal Ox Pack contains following content:

• The Rite Sword and Glove Set
• The Benevolence Sword and Glove Set
• The Justice Sword and Glove Set
• The Integrity Sword and Glove Set

name: Satisfactory: Update 4
description:
Update 4 is finally available on Early Access! This update is jam-packed with new content! New Nuclear Refinement and waste recycling, new top tier buildings, lights - together with the new changes to power this update is fully charged.
There are improvements to networking, optimisations, UI, quality of life, all the good stuff.

name: Final Fantasy XIV: Death Unto Dawn
description: In Patch 5.5 the stage is set for a cataclysmic battle that will lead into the story of Endwalker. This patch also introduces the third installment of YoRHa: Dark Apocalypse─the Tower at Paradigm's Breach─courtesy of guest creators Yosuke Saito and Yoko Taro, a new event to celebrate the Firmament's completion, and much more!

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit III

name: Warframe: Call of the Tempestarii
description: Cephalon Cy discovers Corpus convoys exploring Void anomalies in Veil Proxima and decides to bring the Tenno along to investigate.

name: Visitor
description: An atmospheric horror game, inspired by black and white movies and liminal spaces.

name: Gaslamp Cases: The Deadly Machine
description: Morgan Johnson is one of Londons finest police detectives. Help him and his partner Jack in this brand new Macht-3 game to solve a thrilling murder case.

name: Jump Force: Character Pack 14 - Giorno Giovanna
description: Giorno Giovanna from Jojo's Bizarre Adventure joins the fray! This pack includes the playable character Giorno Giovanna along with corresponding avatar outfit parts and his moveset.

name: Age of Empires III: Definitive Edition - United States Civilization
description: This content brings the United States as a playable civilization to Age of Empires III: Definitive Edition for the very first time.

name: Midnight Stories
description: This game has three erotic episodes and features multiple voice selection, a multitude of options and game path, animations and 4K renders.

name: Newton's Life at Home: Pixel Art Jigsaw Puzzle
description: Newton's Life at Home is a jigsaw puzzle game made with animated pixel art GIFs instead of images. This game shows the life of the cat Newton in your home. Can you assemble the animated GIFs to find out what he likes to do in your daily life?

name: Little Drift
description: Little drift is a racing game. The goal of the game is to score the most points. There are 4 levels available. In the presence of 9 cars with tuning.

name: Archer boy
description: Archer boy is a game in which you need to defend a castle. Get coins for destroying opponents. Buy upgrades for coins. Beat your previous record.

name: Trainslation
description: What happens when you try navigate a foreign subway system with only a piece of paper on you without being able to understand the signs?

name: 全战天下
description: 【穿越文明，征阀天下】 这是一款历时3年精心制作的跨时空大型多人在线地缘SLG游戏。力求给各位主公带来平衡、有趣、刺激的对抗体验。 我们不设置VIP特权，不出售资源和体力，也不提供类似高级迁城的功能，不设置行军付费加速功能，你可以通过攻城略地、民情任务、秘境闯关、联盟任务、纪元系统等玩法获取资源，公平对决，快速成长，真实体验策略博弈的魅力，感受波澜壮阔的乱世征途！ （本作品可免费下载，游戏内有内购，请诸位主宫充分体验后，适度支持）

name: Lonely Birds
description: A puzzler where you reunite separated PEARakeets with their match by clicking on pairs of animals to make them move towards each other. It starts simple but grows challenging quickly over the many available levels, all in a pretty, cozy and cute setting.

name: Against the Moon: Moonstorm
description: The update tells the new story of the last bastion of humanity. This time, the young warrior Zoy, accompanied by the half-mutated Mazoon, will travel into the heart of Moonstorm to gather resources necessary for survival of the last stronghold of humanity.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: British Rail Class 70 - Colas Rail
description: Drive the highly detailed, modern British GE Class 70 in Colas Rail livery in Trainz. Developed by 3DZUG for TRS19 using the latest PBR technologies, and many custom features!

name: Memorize Cards
description: This is a little game in the genre of paired images for memory.

name: VR Walking Simulator
description: It is a VR Walking Simulator. Nothing more, nothing less. Explore beautiful scenes optimized for VR viewing, take pictures of the scenery, make a collage, and relax.

name: Colorize Inspect
description: In this little game you have to choose the appropriate color.

name: Jurassic Fantasy
description: Follow a young wizard in his path to find the Magical Stones and himself in this Jurassic Fantasy!

name: Endless Furry Ping-Pong
description: Welcome to Endless Furry Ping-Pong! The 7th installment of the "Endless Furry" Series! This game is a simple recreation of the classic Pong game, but with a furry twist!

name: Easter Riddles
description: A game and a brain teaser in one! The new Easter Riddles is a great way to spend an evening improving your mind!

name: Fantasy Dungeon
description: "Fantasy Dungeon" is a randomly generated action RPG shooter with infinity levels. Try to pass as many levels as possible and become a real hero!

name: Inside My Mind
description: In my mind, this game with a bright main character will reveal to you an incredible colorful world.

name: Park Inc
description:
Unpark your cars from jammed parking spaces!

Guide your cars out of the parking, avoiding to hit other cars and moving obstacles.

A wide variety of crowded and troubled parking lots are waiting for your skills on over 150 unique levels, in a never ending game increasingly difficult!

Can you unpark them all?

name: BraveMatch
description: Choose from 6 different heroes to beat 20 different enemy types! Use mana and dig gold to unlock new skills, buy weapons and armor! Fight against your enemies in 20 different beautiful backgrounds! Listen to more than 20 epic fantasy music tracks!

name: Interea
description: A companion visual novel to Adastra that takes place during a time skip in the original story.

name: Nyaa-kuza!!
description: Created by students from the University of Utah's EAE program, Catzooka Studios presents: Nyaa-kuza!! Nyaa-kuza!! is a narrative based fighting game where you play as an ex-yakuza cat, traveling through the outskirts of Japan in order to save your catnapped wife!

name: Dread X Collection: The Hunt
description:
The next chapter in the haunting Dread X Collection series. Co-produced by the legendary David Szymanski (DUSK, The Music Machine, Squirrel Stapler), Dread X Collection: The Hunt showcases 7 all-new short horror shooters from a handpicked selection of creative and unique indie developers.

Continuing the Dread X Collection story, you play as series newcomer Artemis. Driven by a cryptic message recorded by someone from her past, Artemis makes her way to the ARK 2 research base. Explore the abandoned base and uncover the mystery of what happened. If you're tough enough, you just might save the world.

name: Demon Skin
description: Demon Skin - is a brutal hack’n’slash set in a rough dark fantasy world, which combines unique combat mechanics, RPG and fighting game elements, and even some platformer features. With its versatile combat system you can fight enemies in both hardcore mode, changing battle stances and weapons in time, and in casual mode, slashing monsters left and right.

name: Kingdom of Arcadia
description: Kingdom of Arcadia is a metroidvania spanning five levels, each with multiple missions to undertake. Sam will encounter a wide variety of enemies, huge bosses and other obstacles in pixelated retro presentation. Fortunately, he can level up and buy new gear from shops to aid in the daunting adventure that lies ahead!

name: Play Together
description:
Play Together is a mobile casual social-network game, full of content that people of all ages would enjoy.

The game provides an interesting and life-like experience that is familiar to the fans of casual and sandbox genres but with fun mini-games and various activities, such as hosting a party, attending classes, fishing, camping, and more.

The gameplay proceeds freely in a non-linear narrative structure according to the player's free will. Players can also customize their characters and houses by purchasing various items and socialize with their global friends without borders.

Play Together has entered soft launch in Southeast Asia region near the end of 2020. The player count is increasing rapidly through word of mouth, which is being backed by the very positive player response.

The game will be released in 2021 on the App Store and Google Play, following a region-based release schedule.

name: Deiland: Pocket Planet
description:
Deiland: Pocket Planet Edition is a relaxing farming adventure where you will have to take care of your tiny planet. Farm, craft and fight monsters to make your home a special place and help others with their quest.

Discover the story of Arco in this single-player experience, a tale about growing up, helping others and revealing the secrets that lie on the heart of your planet. We’ve crafted a relaxing game, with a strong narrative and a cast of diverse characters for you to meet.

name: Poker Squadrons: Battle of Britain
description:
Fight the Battle of Britain, four Poker hands at a time!

Poker Squadrons is a single-player card game where you play out the events of the Battle of Britain.

You take control of a British Royal Air Force Fighter Squadron and are pitted against a computer opponent controlling the German Luftwaffe.

Both sides draw cards from a shared 52-card deck to simultaneously assemble 4 poker hands to send into combat.

The shuffled deck and opponent's AI ensure a unique challenge each time you play.

Poker Squadrons brings you back to 1940, when Germany launched Operation Sea Lion, their plan to invade Great Britain. Events from the historic aerial battle are presented in the game's 18 stages, which are played in 4 phases:

1. Scramble: Draw cards to assemble the best 4 poker hands possible.

2. Secret Cards: Play a secret card increase your chance of victory in combat. NOTE: This phase is not available until stage 3.

3. Form Up: Drag to reorder your assembled poker hands to match up against the incoming poker hands, some of which may contain hidden cards that remain face-down until the combat phase begins.

4. Combat: You must win at least 3 out of the 4 poker hand matchups to clear each stage.

name: Liars Village
description: The new strategic and realistic multiplayer role-playing game up to 12 players! Act discreetly and make the right choices to lead your team to victory!

name: Poison Control
description: Purge poison and raise Hell in this turf war style action RPG. Join forces with Poisonette to purify the Belle's Hells, a spiritual realm born from the sullied hearts of girls.

name: Knight Squad 2
description: Knight Squad 2 is a chaotic arcade multiplayer game for up to 8 players. Pick an eccentric knight and fight for glory with wacky weaponry. Triumph over your friends in a ridiculous amount of game modes, both offline and online.

name: Mister Burnhouse
description: Mister Burnhouse is a real gangster quest with drawn graphics and colorful characters. Many interesting situations and puzzles with a slight flavor of madness!

name: Detective Riddles: Sherlock's Heritage 2
description: A unique detective world and new villainous riddles await you! Solve 120 unique griddlers in Detective Riddles 2!

name: Alvo
description:
A new type of military VR FPS

Alvo is a unique competitive FPS designed from the ground up for VR to provide some of the most thrilling and intense combat seen in the VR FPS genre. Trading ultra-realism for faster-paced gameplay, Alvo is a finely-tuned cocktail of mechanics that will keep you addicted and coming back round after round.

name: Deathmatch Remix
description: Eight deathmatch levels remixed for single player, most of them based on the stock DM maps. They run on the SMP mod (included) and come with two skyboxes plus a music track.

name: Brawl Stars: The Goldarm Gang
description: Sin descripción

name: New Adventure All-Stars
description: New Adventure All-Stars is a custom track distribution created by Mystora, Cats4Life, Potatoman44, and Fynn93. It is a combination of New Mario Kart Fun, Adventure CT Pack and Mario Kart All-Stars. This distribution includes track edits and custom tracks that are generally not included in other distributions during its creation.

name: Kuusou Sakaba: A Great Banquet Of Liars
description: Sin descripción

name: Project: Unity
description: Project: Unity is a full 32 map megawad for Doom II Designed to be fully optimized for the Unity port! This map set comes from some members of the Console Doom Speedrunning community. Don't worry, that does not mean this was designed for speedrunners.

name: Scary Nikki
description: Scary Nikki is a parody Yume Nikki fangame. You play as Sanpurutsuki and explore her strange, terrible and have lots of MEMEs dream world.

name: Super Mario World: A Haunted Christmas
description:
It's almost Christmas, but the Big Boo suddenly stole all of Mario's presents! Now he has to go through the cold and icy terrain to get them back for Princess Peach...

A Haunted Christmas is a short Super Mario World hack with 1 winter-themed world.

name: Dvorec
description: DVOREC is a game inspired by the loud investigation of someone whose name should not be called. Find yourself in the center of political events, international scandals and simply relax in the aquadiskotheque on the territory of the "hotel", completely recreated according to the drawings.

name: Dragonicle
description: Dragonicle is a MMORPG mobile game by X-legend.

name: 三国演义之蜀汉传奇
description: "The Romance of the Three Kingdoms: Legend of Shu Han" is an RPG game with a theme of the history of the Three Kingdoms that happened in China. In the game, player operates Liu Bei's army to suppress anti Han bandits on the vast land of China, maintain the legitimacy of the Han Dynasty.

name: Super Retro Fighter
description: Classic STG game Have fun with your friends just like your childhood!

name: Fruit Juice
description: Fruit Juice - a game close to the genre 3 in a row, made in 2D hand-drawn graphics.

name: The Dark
description: You come round as your escape pod plummets into the inky waters of a distant flooded planet. Comms are down and power failing. You have no choice but to head out into.. the dark.

name: Idle Poker
description: A collaboration between Poker and idle game!! How is your luck?

name: Find Girl
description: Find girl is a simple puzzle game. The game includes all kinds of beautiful girls, waiting for us to find them!

name: Blokker
description: Move the blocks strategically until the balls find the targets. Simple yet challenging! This is Blokker.

name: Wreak the Havoc
description: Wreak the Havoc is a 2D duel base game with quick and casual matches, where the player needs to carry a reactor to the enemy base and wreak it! This game was developed initially as a graduation project by game design students from Fatec São Caetano.

name: Dark War Online
description: Sci Fi RPG game the game was designed mainly as MMORPG where you drive your chosen robot, it can be manually or with the automated combat system ...

name: Endless Furry Asteroids
description: Welcome to Endless Furry Asteroids! The 6th installment of the "Endless Furry" Series!

name: Wordle
description: Wordle is a fun and addictive word game that challenges your vocabulary skills. Try it now and see how many words you can create!

name: Prisoner 17
description: Prisoner 17 is a dynamic first-person action platformer (In Death Run mode). In which you have to play the role of a prisoner who got a chance at redemption. Pass all the tests and get the freedom you deserve.

name: Hmmsim Metro
description: Line 1, the most complicated subway in Seoul, is now coming in PC version. You can feel high immersion with the graphics that realize the actual Seoul scenery, the train driving sound, and the realistic train driving system. Experience the operation of the Seoul subway!

name: Bomb Escape
description: Bomb Escape is a game of skill and reflex. Avoid everything and prove that you will have the best time in the arena!

name: Parkour Go
description: Parkour: Go is a fun 3D browser-based parkour game set on a series of obstacle courses. You can complete tracks, beat records, or practice in the arena.

name: Devil Book: Hand-Drawn Action MMO
description: Devil Book has hand-drawn style graphics. You can enjoy a variety of hand-drawn skills and character animations. You will make your own team with the heroes from various dimensions to save the game world. Begin your adventure now to find the lost ‘Book of Destiny’!

name: Pixel Art Coloring Book
description: Pixel Art Coloring Book easily removes your stress! A huge range of colorful pixel art images in this coloring book is for ALL AGES! Relax while coloring awesome pixel art coloring pages. Start color by number today & feel better. It’s simple. It’s good. It’s fun.

name: Inner Tao
description: A meditative journey along minimalist hand crafted puzzles, where you'll learn and master the opposites.

name: PogoChamp
description: PogoChamp is a physics-based 3D platformer where you can't walk. Instead, you'll need to tilt, jump, flip, and roll your way to the goal, without hitting your head.

name: Runeverse
description: Runeverse redefines the multiplayer card game genre with its innovative, captivating approach. Dive into an awe-inspiring fantasy realm, construct your deck at no cost, master your strategy, and climb to victory! Experience the thrill of a tactical 8-player Card Auto Battler that will challenge you.

name: HardLander
description: HardLander is a tough-as-nails "Rocket Wrestling" arena designed for up to 4 players. Invite three of your friends to compete for bragging rights and couch cred in what might be the most advanced rocket wrestling simulation ever created! Practice your piloting expertise through 40 punishing challenge courses that will be sure to have you throwing your controller across the room as you hone your skills.

name: Resident Evil: Wesker Rebirth
description: Experience the story of Albert Wesker as he fights his way out of the Arklay Research Facility and Spencer Mansion to escape before the entire complex self destructs in this exciting mod that takes place moments after the original game!

name: Normal Shmup
description: Normal Shmup is a strange shoot em' up game based around classic gameplay. Fight the enemies and regain control of the world again.

name: Adrift in Turbulent Waters
description:
A short tale about bringing hope and help to various people who are all in the same storm.

The game requires you as the player to sail your boat full of supplies to people on islands across the sea from screen-to-screen. Please help with rescuing those that have found themselves at the mercy of the elements.

name: Dark Forest: Lost Story VR
description: In this horror game we will tell you truthful stories about demons and ghosts.

name: Chicken Holmes: The Mystery of Bartolomeu
description: Use your most valuable chicken detective skills to solve the Bartolomeu's mystery. In this point'n click game you explore a kidnapper house guided by a series of ink marks of poor Rubens, the Butcher of the city. Judite gathered the information and just disappeared. Now, fend for yourself!

name: Titan Tactics
description: Created in one month for the 32-bit Jam, plus an extra 3 weeks for the Spring Cleaning Jam! A follow up to Pocket Tactics, Titan Tactics is inspired by the awesome tactic games of the 90s. Fight with your allies and uncover the mysteries of the kingdoms of Tyrmyr and Skathi!

name: Piozila
description:
Piozila is a puzzle game, with a hungry chameleon and a lovely colorful graphics.

Your goal is to help a small chameleon to escape by intelligently moving the chameleon and other objects. Solve puzzles, avoid fires and traps, and above all, beware of humans.

Mena mena games is a game development team based in Madagascar, in the South East region of Africa.

name: Hix: Puzzle Islands
description:
Help the godlike Hix restore his islands, after his devilish brother Dix has made a mess of things.

Swap land tiles to reconnect all roads and rivers to their original start and end points. Connect all the puzzle pieces in the right way, and you will see the islands spring back to life!

name: DaGame
description:
The best DaBaby mobile game!

Features Include:

- multiple characters
- epic music
- epic sound effects
- challenging gameplay
- play as a DaBaby car/convertible

Thank you for playing!

name: The Walking Dead: Survivors
description: Do you have what it takes to lead a community in the world of The Walking Dead? Can you overcome the never-ending threat of roaming Walkers as you scavenge for supplies across the ravaged Southern landscape? Cross paths with iconic Walking Dead heroes Rick, Michonne, and Glenn as you scour the radio waves searching for other survivors. Build a refuge from the rubble and defend it against overwhelming Walker herds – but be prepared to fight the living as well as the dead! Every action you take in this cutthroat world will come with a difficult choice: your humanity, or your survival?

name: Lug's Tiny Torture
description: Sin descripción

name: Gamer Girls 18+
description: Our Gamer's Club is full of sexy loveable girls! Will you solve the puzzle into their panties? "Gamer Girls 18+" is a game combined with pretty girl, visual novel and awesome mechanics. Cute and sexy girl in different states. All characters in the game are over the age of 18.

name: Solitaire & Share
description: Solitaire & Share puts a modern spin on the old classic solitaire card game. It’s striking, minimal, relaxing, and… multiplayer? Play by yourself or with friends! Who said solitaire had to be solitary?

name: Hentai Climbing
description: Hentai Climbing is an exciting third-person acrobatic game. You have to take control of a beautiful anime girl and test your dexterity!

name: Scars of Summer
description: A slice of life RPG. Due to family circumstances, Keita finds himself living with his childhood friend Ryoka for the summer. Explore a contemporary Japanese setting, and enjoy spending time with Ryoka.

name: Grey Bones
description: Grey Bone is an action platformer with puzzle elements. The main character challenges dangerous opponents and is able to solve the most difficult puzzles.

name: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate: IWS
description: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: Hentai Balloons 2
description: Gameplay: Move All Parts to Form the Complete Image.

name: Air Hoppers 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Breadly's Grandma Rescue
description: An indie action game that strives to balance fun, being annoyed and things that don't make sense.

name: Sudoku Master
description: Sudoku Master is a logic-based number puzzle where the goal is to place the numbers 1-9 in each box so that each number appears only once in each row, column and mini grid. With our Sudoku app you can not only play whenever you wish, at different difficulty levels, but you can also learn sudoku techniques.

name: Checkers Master
description: Checkers Master is a checkers game with American/English official rules. Your goal: capture all your opponent's pieces. This game supports both 1 player and 2 player gameplay, so you can play against friends or test your skills against a challenging computer opponent. Intuitive touch controls make it easy to play checkers on your device - just tap a piece and then tap where you want it to go.

name: Candy Match Kiddies
description: Line up candies in this entertaining and captivating matching game by 3. Help Kiddies get ready for a fabulous fiesta by collecting an assortment of delicious treats!

name: Cyberika
description:
Cyberika is an action-adventure MMORPG with a deep storyline set in a cyberpunk universe. Are you ready to explore a city in the near future called Bradbury Complex?

Meet its inhabitants, complete important quests, fight with freaky punks in dark backstreets and race through neon lit streets in your sports car. Who knows, maybe on your way home you’ll stop in downtown to install another body implant or grab some ramen?

name: FoxInTheBox
description: FoxInTheBox is a small platform for cyber security, teaching methods of ethical hacking and creating challenges to solve.

name: .Cat
description: It is a beautiful 2D pixel art game for all ages. Where you are a cat, you must avoid obstacles and beat enemies looking for the end of each stage.

name: Virus Popper
description: Play the cleanest game in VR... Wash your hands & POP the virus!

name: Sigma Draconis
description: A group of colonists from a distant world have arrived at their new home. Equipped with advanced technology but limited resources, they must build to survive. Sigma Draconis is a colony simulation game which focuses on building and resource management.

name: Bill & Carol
description:
On one fateful New Years Day, Bill Mcginty, an old man with plenty of anger issues finally loses it for good, shooting his wife Carol's pet bird, and shooting fireworks at her, sending her flying out a window!
While Bill pursues the path of an enraged criminal, Carol teams up with her new friend Henry, and her brother Sam as they all play a part in bringing Carols' husband to justice!

Go on a crazy criminal journey as Bill, change sides, and try to stop him as Carol and Sam, or even play through some backstories / unseen moments of your favourite characters seen throughout the game!

name: Elite X: Street Racer
description: Run on tracks inspired by real scenery. Accelerate on incredible, realistic maps. Live on the edge between chaos and control, stepping deep in this street car racing game.

name: Essence of Waluigi
description:
Ralorche is back with his first attempt at a serious fan game!

5 years ago, Luigi was killed by "the essence". As a result of this, Mario has left the Mushroom Kingdom. Now, thanks to a reoccuring nightmare, Mario has decided to go back and destroy Waluigi's essence once and for all. However, "the essence" plans to destroy the world and build it's own horrifying utopia on it's ruins. Mario will have to travel across locations rarely seen in normal Mario games and battle against new enemies. Will Mario avenge his brother, or will he suffer the same fate?

Or, will he become corrupted by the Essence Of Waluigi?

name: Simulyator Odinochestva V Russkoy Derevne
description: An old Russian hut, endless forests, and not a single person for hundreds of miles around.

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel IV - Standard Costume Bundle
description: A set of costumes and accessories perfect for those seeking new looks and classic styles alike (Altina's Black Rabbit Costume x 1, Rean's Military Uniform x 1, Kurt's Military Uniform x 1, Ash's Military Uniform x 1...)

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel IV - Attachment Set
description: A set of attachments that will let you accessorize behind your wildest dreams.

name: Nail Woman
description: Can you pass the roof rails by your long nails and prove you are a baddie girl? It’s a combination of a racing game and fashion game with nail polish, acrylic nails and high heels. Cut and slice the guys on your podium to unlock new baddies and make long nails.

name: Easter Candy Break: Head to Head
description: Easter Candy Break: Head to Head is a retro arcade game that lets 1 and 2 players play head to head in a competitive arcade environment. Unique animated bricks tumble down toward the users paddle along with Mini-Bosses and Powerups. Collect powerups as you progress through the levels and defeat your opponent.

name: Blaze the Cat in Sonic the Hedgehog
description: A ROM hack of Sonic the Hedgehog which changes Sonic for Blaze the Cat.

name: Golf Dreams
description: Golf Dreams is a free golf simulation game using real physics and groundbreaking controls making it one of the most true golf games out there!

name: Sword Hunter
description:
The peaceful town has been infiltrated by thugs and rival gangs. Stop them with your blades! As the hunter of the famed dojo, you are the only hero who can resist the endless waves of enemies.
Sharpen your blades, hone your skills and gear as you embark on this perilous mission. Combine ruthless sword power with powerful skills to defeat your foes!

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel IV - Digital Deluxe Edition
description: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel IV Digital Deluxe Edition includes the base game, the Swimsuit Bundle, Magical Girl Bundle, and Standard Costume Bundle.

name: Puzzle Aquarium
description: Sin descripción

name: Shem Ha Mephorash
description: "Shem Ha Mephorash" is a historical low fantasy strategy game set in the battlefield at the end of the 19th century, where you can explore the language of miracles. Treat the unique "rabbi" and the soldiers skillfully and guide them to the end.

name: Cinemoji
description: Do you watch many movies? Test your deduction skills and your cinema knowledge trying to guess the name of the film represented by the emojis. Don't be shy to ask for help, you probably won't discover all the answers by yourself!

name: Alveole
description: Alveole is a minimalistic puzzle where the player must understand how to run and why does he do it?

name: Captain's Choice Bundle
description:
This bundle includes:
- Skyland: Heart of the Mountain
- Uncharted Tides: Port Royal
- Nightmares from The Deep 3: Davy Jones

name: Carnal
description: A small and challenging retro-fueled FPS straight from the nightmares of 90's millennials. The Sons of Anak are opening portals to extract Dark Matter from the "other side". Combat the possessed soldiers, the manifested demons helping them and any inanimate objects standing in your way!

name: Coloring Pixels: Amusement Park Pack
description: This Amusement Park Book brings 20 new images to Coloring Pixels! Each image is of iconic amusement park scenes! Grab some cotton candy or ride on your favourite park rides in this new book!

name: Silver Soul
description: Silver Soul is a first-person horror adventure game based on a sci-fi thriller. The story tells the story of a young man who falls off a cliff while being chased to the top of a mountain by the army, but enters another part of the earth where alien creatures fall, who is good and who is evil.

name: Theofil
description: Theofil is an action arcade game in which you'll guide a hooded hero wearing an ancient robe. Your weapon is a magical wooden staff that brave Theofil uses to destroy his enemies. His abilities will help you fight against dangerous enemies.

name: Tower of Waifus
description: Tower of Waifu is a Tactical match 3 puzzle game. Learning spells, upgrading your stats and creating your own tactics, conquer the tower, defeat bosses.

name: The Mermaid of Zennor
description: A short, dark visual novel about a young girl's destructive obsession with her older brother.

name: Hopeless Dregs
description: Hopeless Dregs is a turn based roguelike game. There is a team of dregs in your hands. Hire mercs that will match your team, buy them gear and unlock different skills. You'll have to find their strengths and weaknesses in order to unleash full potential and kill bosses!

name: Puzzle & Chess
description: Puzzle & Chess is a relaxing and minimalist game that mixes puzzle challenges with chess moves. Click on pieces, solve the puzzles with a pleasant and relaxing environment. You don't need to know how to play chess to have fun. No score, no timer and no pressure.

name: Love Sucks: Night One
description: Love Sucks is an adult Visual Novel, in which monster-kind has secretly integrated with humanity. Two monster girls, a vampire and a succubus have chosen you to be their date this Halloween! But their motives go beyond just showing you a good time...

name: The Unmarked
description: This family friendly first person shooter is full of adventure, places to explore, and a story to be unfolded. You explore a incredible hand designed world full of secrets and hidden Items, Your goal is to unfold the story of the lost soldier.

name: Race: Total Toon Race
description: Total Toon RaceRace with Formula like cars. Hit the speed pads to gain more speed for a limited time.Start one of the challenging championships.Race against CPU Player, or PvP on the same PC.Listen to great Rock Soundtrack

name: Minna de Karuta Online
description: Sin descripción

name: Girls in Glasses
description: The coming of cherry blossom season also means the start of something new. As he spends time after school and on off days with these three girls, Hidekazu’s life begins to change...

name: Cions of Vega
description: Your daughter Leila ran away from home, so you're going after her to find where she's hiding. Your brother, Logan, accompanies you throughout your journey.

name: Games and Girls
description: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy!

name: Exorcised
description: Become an Exorcist! Defend your city from evil demons by using cute towers designed as shrine maidens. Fight hordes of demons using powerful Alliances and strategize your way towards victory. Upgrade your defense after each map until you'll be able to face the root of all evil!

name: Dark Facets
description: Dark Facets is a 2d strategy action game in the tower defense genre with the unusual mechanics and a unique storyline. In the role of a dark magician, you will have to build your own citadel, mine resources and engage in battle with a dangerous enemy.

name: Empire Invasion
description: Empire Invasion is an engaging and fun tower defense game. The main focus in this title is to try and keep your base safe against a variety of enemies attacking it. You have 40+ levels to test your skills, each one coming with 3 difficulty levels. It helps you test your skills in a rewarding and engaging manner, and you will find the experience to be very exciting and a lot of fun. You have 7 basic pillars, a tower upgrade system and endless replay value and strategies. You can also mix and match to see how fast you eliminate enemies. The power is in your hands, do you have what it takes to defend the kingdom? Features: 40+ levels to play through Engaging, fun tower defense gameplay 3 difficulty levels 7 basic pillar types, each can be upgraded

name: Culot.io
description: Culot.io is a multiplayer browser game combining general knowledge and dare.

name: Together Bnb
description: You will be playing the main character James, whose older brother owns a BnB. James was forced to take over the management of the BnB since his brother mysteriously disappeared.

name: Cobots
description: Manipulate time and cooperate with yourself to solve challenging puzzles! Delve into a colorful world filled with a variety of dangers and unique mind-bending puzzle mechanics.

name: Colony Battle
description: A real-time-strategy game about conquering rival ant colonies. Larger colonies generate ants faster, and there are special colonies along the way which allow for strategic play. There are 40 developer levels, an infinitely random arcade mode, and user-created levels. There are ways to customize your colors and bug type as well.

name: Typo
description: Typo is puzzle-driven sidescrolling adventure. Find your way through a mysterious testing lab, type and spawn what you need to survive in this love letter to the puzzle-platformer, solving tens of unique puzzles in a hand-crafted world.

name: Nuketris
description: A minimalist stacker game with matchmaking, singleplayer modes and a really unique mechanic to bring a twist into the gameplay.

name: Toverblade
description: Toverblade is a magical grid-based strategy game. Train and improve your heroes, explore a dangerous world, and battle enemies such as wolves, giants, and ice golems on your way to a mysterious fortress.

name: Toree 3D
description: A bite-sized 3D Platformer with a few weird elements.

name: Gary Grigsby's War in the East 2
description: War in the East 2 is the most comprehensive, most realistic, and most advanced wargame modeling Eastern Front warfare in World War.

name: Crypt of the Necrodancer: Collector's Edition
description:
This edition includes the following:

- Crypt of the NecroDancer
- Illustrated steelbook case
- Full-color manual
- Exclusive 100% cotton printed “Cadence” bandana
- Enamel pin of “Bucky”
- An unused pet familiar by original NecroDancer artist, Jesse Turner
- Mini-CD of the original NecroDancer and “AMPLIFIED” DLC OSTs, with music by Danny Baranowsky feat. FamilyJules and guest artists, and art by the talented Anailis Dorta.

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel IV - Frontline Edition
description:
The Erebonian Empire is on the brink of all out war! Taking place shortly after the ending of Trails of Cold Steel III, the heroes of Class VII find themselves against the full force of the Empire in an attempt to stop its path of total domination.

The Frontline Edition also includes The Black Records art booklet, an Echoes of Erebonia soundtrack download, and a reverse coversheet.

name: Say No! More
description: Say No! More is a One-Button-Game that is all about saying "No!" and a stolen lunchbox. Defend yourself against mean colleagues and bosses, find mixtapes, discover the "Power of Friendship", and learn to say "No!" more!

name: Run For Cover
description: Run For Cover is a turn-based strategy game where you control a team of soldiers traveling through hostile territory. Every mission is procedurally generated and presents unique challenges every time you play. Your soldiers can find gear and unlock powerful abilities.

name: Make a Good Level Contest X3: The Movie - The Contest: The Game
description: A collaborative level design contest by the SMBX/SMBX2 community, released in 2021, and having taken over a third of SMBX's life cycle to be completed.

name: Twerk Hero: Lil Nas X
description: Twerk something to “Montero (Call Me By Your Name)” in Lil Nas X's Twerk Hero Game!

name: Borderlands 3: Director's Cut
description: Director's Cut is the second "upgrade pack" released for Borderlands 3, including behind-the-scenes content and additional missions and items.

name: Technolympus
description:
Technolympus is an interactive fiction game created in Unity with YarnSpinner 2.1.

When the lights go down in the city of Dion, the hunt begins. While the city's factions race to acquire the coveted HYDR4 drive, three agents become fated to cross paths. Play as the Selenean Hunter, and join the Chariot Operative or the Oneirunner, as you gun for the glory of your organization!

name: Majorelle Mystery
description: Point & click adventure game set in the Villa Majorelle in Nancy, France - a Art Nouveau house with growing plants on the doors blocking you from leaving it.

name: G-Mode Archives+: Tantei Kibukawa Ryousuke Jiken-tan Vol. 2 - Kairoukan Satsujin Jiken
description:
The "Kailoukan", a strange building surrounded by the sea on all sides. Inside a mansion closed underwater, the curtain rises on a tragedy.

Hello, everyone.
My name is Ikurumi, a game scenario writer.

Do you know the previous work "Masked Fantasy Murder Case"?
This time, I would like to introduce an incident that happened in a strange building called "Kairokan" six months after that incident.

It is said that it was built by the former chairman of a famous architectural company as a stranger. This story begins from the place where we are invited to the inauguration event of the mansion.

7 invited guests who visited. The owner of the mansion who will not appear forever. And...

A tragedy that happens in a mansion closed in the sea.
Who is the culprit? What's the motive? And what is the secret hidden in this building? The truth is, in the dark sea...

name: Love in Lockdown: Eli Version
description:
This is the counterpart to Love in Lockdown: Ella Version.

It's the year 2025 in the United Kingdom. 5 years have passed since the initial coronavirus lockdown, and with the gradual spread of dangerous new variants, life is still far from what it was. Fighting a losing battle with no certain end in sight, the government has invested billions of pounds into new technology to help aid Britain's single adult households, struggling to deal with the state of perpetual isolation.

You have been selected to participate in a new wave of trials testing the effectiveness of the latest synthetic model. Meet ELI, your emergency lockdown loneliness assistant.

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Touhou Eurobeat Pack
description:
The brand new “Touhou Eurobeat Pack” contains
selected classics from popular Touhou Eurobeat tunes!

name: Spellbreak: Chapter 2 - The Fracture
description: Play the new Dominion 5v5 capture and control mode as you rank-up in competitive Leagues and join the struggle against the nefarious Vowkeepers.

name: Access Code Zero
description: Access Code Zero tells the story of a spy operation at the Quarantine Bay complex, captured by a group of separatists called HOMOGENES. The main character of the game Bijou, must infiltrate the Quarantine Bay, find researches data, and get back safely. Access Code Zero - an exploration-focused retro-styled platformer in METROIDVANIA genre. The game is expected to follow Metroidvania-style gameplay.

name: Color Pixel Heroes
description: Color Pixel Heroes is an addictive anti-stress pixel art game. Choose from a variety of fun pixel images and follow the numbers to bring them to life. Pixel Coloring has never been this easy!

name: Battle for Sea 3D
description: Naval battles of ships

name: Becoming
description: A self-centered man faces his beliefs when the past comes back to haunt him in the form of a very close friend...

name: Kombi Travels: Jigsaw Landscapes
description: Escape urban life in a sweet Jigsaw Puzzle about Love, Travel and Life. What awaits you when you set the last piece?

name: The Most Boring Life Ever
description: Welcome to another boring game! The highly anticipated sequel to The Most Boring Game Ever is here! This is designed to be a boring experience where you click your way through the days living life with no end in sight. Learn about life and death and the routine we all go through in life.

name: Memento Vivere
description: Dekar is a noble warrior who has a estranged relationship with his father. After abandoning his rights to the throne and choosing to live a simple life, everything changes for him when a Winged One crashes into his village asking for his help. The fate of the world now lies on his shoulders.

name: Fill and Cross: Magic Journey
description: Save the magical pets! Follow the trail and find the predator that committed this audacious crime.

name: Kingslayer: The First Assassin
description: A different Sokoban style game where you have limited grid-movement and attacks in each level. Feel like an assassin in this minimalist puzzle.

name: Little Octopus
description: Take control of your very own reversible octopus plushie! How high can you bounce?

name: Train Sim World 2: Clinchfield Railroad: Elkhorn - Dante Route Add-On
description: Experience classic railroading moving heavy coal and manifest freight through the heart of Virginia's coalfields with Train Sim World 2: Clinchfield Railroad.

name: Hyforge
description: Hyforge is a "roguelike", first-person fantasy rpg; a self-proclaimed "Elder-Rogue." On your quest to find the Hyforge, a device capable of creating and destroying all life, you will encounter Majik, Mystery, and LOOT. Also death... PERMA-DEATH.

name: Lovely Goddess
description: Super easy to really hard to solve puzzles. It's your choice.

name: Hidden Through Time: Road to Rome
description: This DLC includes ten new levels ranging from Gaul settlements to the monumental Colosseum! It also features more than 300 new Roman Empire themed objects and characters, which will be in the level editor upon purchase!

name: Sentinel: Cursed Knight
description: Sentinel: Cursed knight is a single player RPG which sets in the land of Kasweihn. You are a knight of the holy order to investigate what went wrong in the Kasweihn area. The game consists of many abilities, different equipment and a lore rich world to uncover.

name: The Trigger
description: The Trigger is a first person puzzle game. The goal of the game is to find a way out. Each time you start the game levels are procedurally generated. Generated from 50 to 70 rooms The maze is filled with traps. There are 3 types of traps in total.

name: Roads of Time 2: Odyssey
description: Roads of Time is a fun strategy game all about adventure and historical discoveries! Save history from collapsing in time!

name: Times Infinity
description:
Times Infinity is a surreal story-focused adventure game about doing tasks before a deadline to prevent your death in an offbeat university with even more offbeat dorm mates.

In addition to light adventure game mechanics, it contains light platforming and shooting elements.

The initial scenario is as follows, you are PARA, an up and coming freshman at the Tiffson Institute, all seems to be going well as you move in until you get an odd task from a mysterious creature. Asking you to take all of your dorm mates out for a meal, failing this challenge will lead to your demise. With no other choices in tow you push forward to complete this challenge... Then it all gets odder from there.

In addition to the above, the player will also be able to unlock outfits for the player to wear.

name: Buildodge
description: A free to play 2D online shooter game! The game features " building". There are three different modes: Ranked Match, Bot Match, and Custom Match, for 1-4 players! Characters can be customized by changing their skin or painting.

name: The Mysterious Case of Dr.Jekyll and Mr.Hyde
description: After a respected member of Parliament is found murdered, it's up to you to go on the search for the killer, the notorious Mr. Hyde! Step into the shoes of an inspector from Scotland Yard, and dive deep into the case to try to find out why Sir Danvers Crew has been killed. Search beautiful Hidden Object scenes in The Mysterious Case of Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde! Can you crack the case and discover the horrifying truth?

name: Osyaberi! Horijyo! Holin Slash
description: Anna Holinski embarks on a relic thievery investigation, unearthing all kinds of ores and valuables to upgrade her equipment. Her attack power, jumps, energy, and other stats will get stronger with each upgrade. The game's difficulty is balanced so that anyone can clear it through replaying and upgrading equipment, so if you find yourself between a rock and a hard place, upgrades are the way to go! Of course, an "Osyaberi!" game would be incomplete without tons of fully voiced content, and this one is no exception! Even the new characters like the leader of a mysterious organization "Collector Jean", the equipment upgrading shopkeeper "Inari", and more will come to life with fully voiced interactions!

name: Inkslinger
description: As an Inkslinger at Brassknee's renowned Wordshop, it's your job to write letters for the citizens of Isle Shammer. But through the veil of work lies forgotten trauma. A voice begins to speak to you in recurring daydreams, telling you about your tragic past in Nomania.

name: Yoko & Yuki: Dr. Rat's Revenge
description: Yoko & Yuki: Dr. Rat's Revenge is a family game suitable for kids of all ages. Yoko and Yuki are two adorable cats in love with each other. But the devious doctor Rat stole Yuki from Yoko. Now it’s time to do some cat business, using helpful gadgets and solve puzzles in order to save your girlfriend. Our hero is equipped with scissors to cut ropes, gravitron to flip the world and spray can to find hidden objects. Daring players would be handsomely rewarded for using their wits and helping two cats to achieve their happiness!

name: Arcade Archives: Saboten Bombers
description: Saboten Bombers is an action game. Take control of a good little cactus that lives in your house. While you are out, he will protect your house. Throw bombs to drive out the bad cactuses and insects.

name: Sakura In Gameland
description: Sakura has been teleported to GameLand by it's helpless residents to battle the threat of the invading Wizard of Woe and his collection of malevolent monsters. In this 2D platformer help Sakura blast her way through multiple levels across eight areas of GameLand, overcoming the many obstacles put in her way. Can you reach the castle of the vile Wizard and free GameLand from his evil clutches before it's to late!

name: Astro Aqua Kitty
description:
The Aqua Kitty cats have launched into space in an all new action RPG shoot-em-up adventure! Pick your crew, blast off to investigate mysterious water filled asteroids and watch out for marauding pirate rabbits!

Battle bizarre enemies, mine magnificent gems, grab new weapons, install enhancing devices, and unlock your crews' unique skills as you level up XP.

Just watch out for marauding pirate rabbits, always trying to be first to the loot!

name: Euro Truck Simulator 2: Iberia
description: The Iberian Peninsula is full of rich and diverse landscapes, from semi-arid southeastern deserts to the green coniferous forests. Iberia is home to numerous historic villages and towns, narrow streets, old churches and impressive castles. Visit the capital of Spain, Madrid, the coastal capital of Portugal, Lisboa, a wide amount of coastal cities like Málaga and Olhão, and many of the inland cities. Be an important part of the strong export economy and deliver cargo from Iberia through Europe.

name: Swarm
description: Swarm is a fast-paced, arcade-style grapple shooter, with quick sessions, bright colorful worlds and globally competitive leaderboards that will take you back to the glory days of Arcade Games.‍

name: 3 out of 10: Season Two
description: Caffeinated super-powers, sentient AIs, and rival game studios all stand in the way of Shovelworks studios as they struggle to finally make a game that scores better than “3 out of 10”. Will this be the Season that they finally do it?

name: Silver Star Japan Table Games
description: A collection game that includes Asonde Poker ga Tsuyoku Naru! Texas Hold ‘Em, Honkaku AI Tousai Daifugo, Honkaku AI Tousai Ginsei Mahjong, and Silver Star Chess.

name: Scarlet Hood and the Wicked Wood
description: Scarlet Hood and the Wicked Wood is a story-driven adventure game. As Scarlet, you must relive seven days of misfortune, and make a series of decisions to guide your Munchkin troupe safely out of the Wicked Wood. Experience branching outcomes based on your decisions. Most importantly, immerse yourself in a bewitching story of fantastic adventure!

name: Across the Obelisk
description: Across the Obelisk is an immersive RPG deckbuilding cooperative roguelite. Play solo or with your friends, choose your heroes, craft your deck and face powerful enemies. Would you dare to go across the obelisk?

name: In My Shadow
description: Play with shadows in your own imaginative ways to solve twisted puzzles as you unfold the memories of a girl who struggles to confront herself in her past.

name: Astrodogs
description: Astrodogs is a fast-paced arcade action game featuring a cast of space dogs that have to save the galaxy of WOOFER, a company that controls everything. Also run by dogs.

name: 8Doors: Arum's Afterlife Adventure
description: 8Doors is Metroidvania style 2D action platformer game based on Korean afterlife world view. Explore 8 different area of purgatory by becoming the main character 'Arum'. Solve the mystery of happening on purgatory through fight against the specter and lead fugitive souls to the right path.

name: Traffic Jams
description: In a world without traffic lights, one reigns supreme. It's up to you to keep traffic flowing in the face of outrageous events and flagrant road rage. Easy? Think again! This chaotic VR traffic controlling game throws in monsters, (un)natural disasters, and up to 4 non-VR friends in party mode!

name: Potion Party
description: Potion Party is a funny couch co-op alchemy game for one to four players. Working as a team, you and your friends must manage your own alchemy shop. Earn money, upgrade your tools, decorate the shop and become a master alchemist!
